After growing up and gaining all the experience needed, Haydar inherited his father’s business and took over the garage in 2002. Now Haydar has gained an excellent reputation thanks to his fast work and competitive prices.

Haydar is requesting a youth loan of 3,000 USD in order to pay the annual rent of the garage and to buy specialized equipment for his work. Haydar is aiming to grow his business and increase its profits so that he will be able to educate his children and provide for all of their needs.

loans.use: to pay the annual rent of the garage and to buy specialized equipment for his work.

loans.name: Cresencia

texts.en:
Cresencia is 47 years old, married with four children. She lives in Bonifacio, Misamis Occidental. She owns and operates a retail business in the local community to earn a living. She has been in her business for over seven years and earns 15,000 PHP every month. 

She joined in GDMPC in the year 2010, and now she has requested a loan of 20,000 PHP to purchase additional products to sell such as canned goods, noodles, eggs and dried fish. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell such as canned goods, noodles, eggs and dried fish.

loans.name: Zuhaira

texts.en:
Zuhaira is a 58-year-old widow who sells home products and few decoration pieces to be able to support herself and her family. 

Now Zuhaira is applying for a loan to buy more home products to sell so as to increase her profits.

loans.use: to buy more home products to sell.

loans.name: Joan

texts.en:
Joan, 31 years old, is married to a bus driver and blessed with two children. She has managed a piggery business for almost three years. In this business she earns a net income of PHP 3,000 per hog. 

She would like to avail herself of a loan amounting to PHP 15,000 to purchase hog feed for her hogs. She's hoping that her loan will be granted so that she will be able to improve further her business to gain more income.

loans.use: To purchase hog feed for her hogs.

loans.name: Vladimir

texts.es: El señor Vladimir tiene 37 años, es soltero, no tiene hijos y está viviendo en la zona de el plan 3000, el vive en la casa de su tía en alquiler ya que no cuenta con casa propia. Con el trabajo que desempeñaba como chofer de taxi a llegado a juntar dinero lo cual le permitió comprar su propia herramienta de trabajo, un vehículo,  con el cual trabaja para poder comer, vestirse y pagar su alquiler. El señor Vladimir está solicitando el crédito para reparaciones de su vehículo, para que de esta manera pueda continuar mejorando su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Vladimir is 37 years old, single with no children, and is living in the Plan 3000 zone. He lives in a house that his aunt and he rent because he doesn't have his own house. With the work he performed as a taxi driver he managed to combine money to buy his own tool for work, a vehicle, with which he worked to eat, get clothing, and pay his rent. Vladimir is asking for a loan to repair his car so that he can continue improving the quality of his life.

loans.use: repair his vehicle

loans.name: Wendith Del Rocio

texts.es:
La Señora Wendith vive en Orquídeas, ella tiene 37 años de edad. Ella como no trabajaba no tenía trabajo, decidió implementar las venta de cosméticos para tener más  ingresos a su hogar.

Ella no tiene ninguna dificultad al realizar la venta de sus cosméticos. Ella esta casada y su esposo conduce una línea de bus. Ya son mayores de edad.

Ella usara el préstamo para la venta de productos Avon y asi comprar perfumes, cremas, cosmeticos. Ella desea para el futuro seguir con sus ventas, aspira también a poder tener un negocio de embutidos.
texts.en:
Sra. Wendith is 37 years old and lives in Orquídeas. Since she was not able to find a job, Wendith decided to start selling cosmetics as a way of generating more household income.

She has not had any difficulties with her cosmetics sales business. Wendith is married and her husband is a bus driver. Both of them are grown adults.

Wendith will use this loan to buy Avon products such as perfumes, crèmes, and cosmetics. In the future, she plans to continue her sales and aspires to also open a sausage business.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, crèmes, and cosmetics.

loans.name: Jona

texts.en:
Jona is a married woman, 31 years old, from Garcia, Bohol. She has two children. The oldest is eight years old and the youngest is five years old. She is engaged in a fishing business. She has been in this business for nine years now together with her husband. This is the source of her income.

Jona is requesting a loan to buy a boat, an engine and a fishing net. This is equipment and material used in fishing. With the help of the loan, she will be able to provide the equipment and materials for her business.

In the future, Jona hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy a boat, an engine and a fishing net.

loans.name: Otgontsetseg

texts.en:
Mrs. Otgontsetseg, 49 years old, lives with her husband and two children in Darkhan, the second largest city of Mongolia. The family resides in their own house on a plot of land. She and her husband are milliners and since 2005 they have been manufacturing and selling hats to local people. They make various types of hats such as sable hat, hats for artists and fur caps. 

The external parts of house the family lives in has been deteriorating over the years and needs some repair. Also, in order to grow vegetables on their fenced land, she wants to dig a well. So she is requesting a loan of 2,500,000 MNT to purchase building materials such as bricks and cements to repair the house and pay for well-digging. 

As a result, the house won't lose heat through its outer walls and windows; also the family will burn less coal, emit less smoke and contribute to cleaner air. More importantly, digging the well and growing vegetables will contribute to the efforts against air pollution greatly. The borrower is a very hardworking individual who strives for a better future.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for well-digging and to grow vegetables.

loans.name: Hussain

texts.en:
Hussain is from Iraq. He is 34 years old, married and has four children. Hussain and his elder child provide the family income, while the other three are continuing their education.

Hussain owns a blacksmith’s shop. He gained his long experience while working with his father ever since he was a boy. In 2006, Hussain established his own business and now he has hired an employee. He has gained a good name in his surrounding area thanks to his way of behaving with his customers.

Hussain is requesting a loan of $3,000. He will use this loan to buy a medium sized motor generator of the DIESEL brand. This motor generator will aid him to increase in his production. By the increase of his production and hence revenues, Hussain will be able to easily pay the school fees of his children and by a new house in the future.

loans.use: to buy a medium-sized motor generator.

loans.name: Siham

texts.en:
Siham is a 46-year-old single lady. She lives with her mother and a younger sister since their father passed away. 

Siham sells clothes, home products and some make-up products from home to make a living. She is applying for a loan to increase the quantity of goods she has in order to have variety and increase her profits.

loans.use: to increase the quantity of goods she has.

loans.name: Manuela

texts.es: La señora Manuela, es una persona de 62 años de edad, de estado civil casada que vive junto a su marido en  su propio domicilio, no alcanzo a estudiar la educación escolar y no cuenta con dependientes económicos a cargo;  la actividad económica a la que se dedica es la producción agrícola, produce papa y haba en sus propios terrenos las cuales cuentan con riego por inundación que se hallan situadas en la comunidad de Uchuchi Cancha  del municipio de Tíraque que esta distante a unos 70Km. desde la ciudad de Cochabamba. La señora Manuela y su marido son personas trabajadoras y responsables que quieren superarse y para tal efecto se ven en la necesidad de solicitar un crédito para la compra de una vaca lechera, ya que actualmente cuenta con tres vacas lecheras que a futuro les permitirá obtener mayores ingresos económicos que vayan a mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Manuela is 62 years old, married, and lives with her husband in her own home.  She did not get a formal education and she has no financial dependents.  She works in farming for a living, growing potatoes and broad beans on her own land, which has an irrigation system and is located in the community of Uchuchi Cancha in the municipality of Tíraque, 70km from the city of Cochabamba.  Manuela and her husband are hardworking and responsible people who want to better themselves.  To that aim, they need a loan to buy a dairy cow, as they currently have three dairy cows that in the future will allow them to make more income and improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Jose Miguel

texts.es: José Miguel es una persona muy trabajadora que vive en la ciudad de Tarija, él tiene 29 años de edad, es casado y tiene dos pequeños hijos de nueve y dos años de edad, a los cuales apoya mucho junto a su esposa; José Miguel no estudio por problemas económicos y personales así que se dedicó desde muy joven a la construcción civil (albañil), actualmente empezó a adquirir trabajos de forma individual como contratista, lo cual le genera mejores ingresos, pero necesita comprar una maquina mescladora pequeña y algunas  herramientas más, ya que está a punto de empezar otro trabajo más, es por este motivo que hace la solicitud de este nuevo crédito, para así generar más ingresos y  poder crecer económicamente, continuar apoyando a su esposa e hijos y poder ahorrar para comprarse un lote de terreno ya que actualmente vive en casa de los padres de su esposa que los apoyan solo con vivienda.
texts.en: José Miguel is a very hardworking person from Tarija. He is 29 years old, married, and has two little children who are 9 and 2 years old. He takes care of them a lot together with his wife. José Miguel did not go to school due to economic and personal problems, so from a young age he dedicated himself to civil construction as a bricklayer. He has begun to acquire tools for individual work as a contract worker, which brings him a better income, but he need to buy a small mixing machine and some other tools not that he is at the point of beginning another project. For this motive, he is asking for this new loan to make more income and be able to grow economically so he can continue supporting his wife and children, and also so he will be able to save and buy them a plot of land because they currently live with his wive's parents who only support them with the house.

loans.use: to buy a small mixer

loans.name: Haydar

texts.en:
Haydar is a youth client from Iraq, who is single and lives with his parents. Haydar is the only provider for the family.

Haydar owns a small shop where he sells laptops and accessories like keyboards, mouses, CDs and DVDs. After gaining all the experience needed in this field while previously working at a similar shop as an employee, Haydar found his passion for technology and decided to open his own shop in his neighborhood. In 2010, Haydar successfully managed to establish his own business and has gained an excellent reputation since he is the only person who has a similar shop in the area.

Haydar is requesting a youth loan of $3,000 to renovate his shop and to buy more accessories to sell. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so that he will be able to take a better care of his parents.

loans.use: to renovate his shop and to buy more accessories to sell.

loans.name: Dufashanye Group

texts.fr:
Joselyne  fait partie du groupe Dufashanye et  habite à  Gitega. Elle a 43 ans et est mariée  à Astère, un pasteur d’une église. Ensemble ils ont 4 enfants  tous étudient.

Elle fait le commerce de beignets depuis 8 ans. 

Elle est à son  quatrième crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle  obtient, elle  va  augmenter la quantité de beignets  à vendre pour gagner plus. 

Grâce aux bénéfices, elle  parvient à  acheter les habits des enfants, et payer leurs frais scolaires.
texts.en:
Joselyne is member of the Dufashanye Group and lives in Gitega. She is 43 years old and is married to Astère, who is the pastor of a church. Together they have four children, all of whom attend school.

Joselyne has been selling beignets for the past eight years. She is currently on her fourth loan cycle with Turame. With the loan she receives from KIVA, Joselyne will be able to increase the quantity of beignets she sells and earn a higher income. The income she earns will allow Joselyne to purchase clothing for her children and to pay their school fees.

loans.use: to increase the quantity of beignets she sells and earn a higher income

loans.name: Casiano

texts.es: El señor Casiano,  tiene 35  años de edad, casado, tiene dos hijos dependientes, proviene de familia de escasos recursos, vive en una vivienda rústica con paredes de adobe  con interiores revocado con barro. En la comunidad donde vive la fertilidad de suelos es muy baja, comparte su vida con los parientes más cercanos como ser su hermana y sobrinos, que los colaboran en la producción según sus posibilidades. Por las lluvias torrenciales presentados en el mes de febrero, los sembradíos de maíz y zanahoria han sufrido inundaciones, lo cual ha ocasionado pérdidas considerables en el desarrollo de los cultivos y un rendimiento negativo en la producción, es por estos motivos que la estabilidad económica del señor Casiano ha sufrido un desequilibrio, afectando directamente en la adquisición de los materiales e insumos requeridos para la producción. Para enmendar lo mencionado anteriormente ha recurrido al crédito para comprar semilla de frejol, compra de semilla de papa y compra de abono químico y agroquímicos; el objetivo del crédito es  mejorar la producción y retomar el camino de la prosperidad. También indica que ampliará la frontera agrícola con la diversificación de cultivos.
texts.en: Casiano is 35 years old, married, and has two dependent children.  He comes from a family of few means and he lives in a rustic home with adobe walls whose interior is plastered with clay.  In the area where he lives, the soil has very low fertility.  He shares his life with his closest relatives, such as his sister and nephews, who help him with his farming when they can.  Because of the torrential rains in the month of February, his corn and carrot plantings suffered flooding, which has caused him considerable losses in his crops and a negative yield.  Because of this, Casiano's financial stability has been thrown off balance, which has directly affected his ability to acquire the materials and supplies he needs for planting.  To remedy the aforementioned, he is asking for a loan to buy bean seed, to buy potato seed,  and to buy chemical fertilizer and agrochemicals.  The goal of this loan is to improve his yield and get back on the road to prosperity.  He also tells us he will expand his farming frontier by diversifying his crops.

loans.use: to buy seed (bean and potato), to buy chemical fertilizer, and agrochemicals

loans.name: Wendi

texts.es:
Wendi, de 64 años de edad, es una mujer emprendedora y alegre, muy trabajadora. Es viuda del padre de sus hijos. Vive en compañía de su  hija con su nieto en la casa propia que compro hace muchos años .Wendi se dedica a la venta de comidas en los horarios de almuerzo, tales como arroz chaufa, pollos fritos,  asados de pollos y otros platillos que sabe preparar.  Para atender a sus clientes  cuenta con 2 mesas y sillas que instala  en el frontis de su casa, actividad que realiza con el apoyo de su hija.  También vende bebidas gasificadas heladas  y golosinas  en su propia casa, para lo cual cuenta con una exhibidora donde guarda estas bebidas y las puede vender a la temperatura que les agrada a sus clientes por lo caluroso de la región. 
Iniciándose en ambos negocios hace más de 06 años.
Le gusta su actividad pues cuenta con un ingreso económico, además de estar en la comodidad de su casa.  Se siente una persona  productiva y le distrae,  tiene regular clientela que se supo ganar con el transcurso del tiempo.  Desear continuar con su negocio y crecer aun  más.Este es el préstamo número 03 con Kiva, Está muy contenta de  saber que cuenta con un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su negocio.  Por otro lado se compromete una vez más a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en anteriores crédito que tuvo.
Con el monto solicitado de S/.1500 nuevos soles comprará víveres e ingredientes para la preparación de menús como arroz, aceites, pollos, carnes, verduras y otros,  así como bebidas gasificadas y golosinas  al por mayor, buscando conseguir menores precios para obtener mayores ganancias.
texts.en:
Sixty-four-year-old Wendi is an enterprising, cheerful, and very hardworking woman.  She is the widow of her children's father.  She lives with her daughter and her grandson in the home she bought many years ago.  Wendi sells prepared meals during lunchtime hours, such as fried rice, fried chicken, grilled chicken, and other dishes she knows how to make.  She has two tables and chairs she sets up in front of her home to serve her customers.  Her daughter helps her with her work.  She also sells cold soft drinks and candy inside her home, where she has a display case where she can keep the drinks to sell at the temperature her customers like in this hot area.

She started both business over six years ago.

She likes her work as it gives her a source of income and because it is in the comfort of her own home.  It makes her feel productive and it keeps her occupied. She has a regular clientele she was able to build over time.  She wants to keep going with her business and grow even more.  This is her third loan with Kiva.  She is very happy to know that she can count on financial support, as this gives her the confidence to move ahead with her business.  She also promises to once again make her payments, as she did with her previous loans.

With the requested 1,500 nuevos soles, she will buy foodstuffs and ingredients to prepare dishes, such as rice, oils, chicken, meat, and vegetables, among others.  She will also buy soft drinks and candy in bulk, seeking out the lowest prices to make the most profit.

loans.use: to buy products such as rice, oils, and vegetables, among others

loans.name: Manuel Jesus

texts.es: El señor Jesús es un hombre luchador, Ejemplar y magisterial ya que tiene un taller de ebanistería donde ha enseñado a sus hijos el arte de fabricar muebles de madera, donde involucra a su familia en la misma, también ejerce la profesión de mecánico automotriz, del cual ya tiene 20 años de tener dichos negocios, es casado con 2 hijos  a su cargo,  que les apoya para su preparación académica, también su esposa tiene un pequeño negocio de venta de ropa, ya que de manera familiar manejan diversidad de actividades comerciales como fuentes de ingresos diversos, actualmente se le presento una necesidad por lo que visito a ceprodel para solicitar financiamiento que utilizaría en la compra de 2000 pulgadas de madera de especie laurel , para la confección de demanda del producto elaborado, y de esa manera incrementar las ventas y mejorar las condiciones  familiares.
texts.en:
Jesús is a determined, exemplary and dignified man as he has a wooden furniture workshop where he involves his family and taught his children the art of furniture-making. 

He is also a motor mechanic. He has had these businesses for 20 years and is married with two children. He supports them in their studies and his wife also has a small business selling clothes. Therefore, as a family they manage diverse activities and have income from different sources. 

At the moment he needs finance and so he has approached Ceprodel to request money to buy 2000 inches of Laurel wood to make his products so that he can increase his sales and improve his family conditions.

loans.use: to buy 2000 inches of Laurel wood

loans.name: Angela Maria

texts.es:
ANGELA tiene 41 años de edad es casada tiene siete hijos, vive con los hijos y el esposo en Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar.

Es Integrante de la VRC ALLY ÑAN esta conformada por 10 socios que son de la misma comunidad, esta ubicada a 20 minutos de la oficina.

ANGELA se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, habas, además se dedica a la crianza de pollos y ganado.
Solicita el crédito para comprar urea, fertilizantes, insecticidas, herbicidas, vacunas. Con la ayuda del crédito podra comprar lo que le hace falta para las siembras. 

Las compras las realizará en la ciudad de Guaranda. El sueño es ver a los hijos profesionales. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es comprarce un carro. En el tiempo libre le gusta ayudar al esposo.
texts.en:
Angela is 41 years old, married, and has seven children.  She lives with her husband and children in Guaranda, in the province of Bolívar.

She is a member of the Ally Ñan Communal Bank, which is made up of 10 members who are from the same community that is 20 minutes from the office.

Angela farms for a living, growing corn and broad beans, and she also raises chickens and cattle.

She is asking for a loan to buy urea, fertilizers, insecticides, herbicides, and vaccines.  With the help of the loan she will be able to buy what she needs for her crops.

She will make her purchases in the city of Guaranda.  Her dream is to see her children become professionals.  The challenge she faces is buying a car.  In her free time she likes to help her husband.

loans.use: to buy urea, fertilizers, insecticides, herbicides, and vaccines.

loans.name: Luis Fernando

texts.es:
LUIS tiene 22 años de edad es casado tiene dos hijos, vive con los hijos y la esposa en la ciudad de Gauranda provincia de Bolívar.

Es Integrante de la VRC ALLY ÑAN esta conformada por 10 socios que son de la misma comunidad, esta ubicada a 20 minutos de la oficina.

Luis traaja en una ferreteria, además se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, habas, alverja, crianza de pollos.

Solicita el crédito para comprar urea, fertilizantes, insecticidas, herbicidas. Con la ayuda del crédito podra comprar lo necesario para la agricultura. 

Las compras las realizará en la ciudad de Guaranda. El sueño es ayudar a la esposa con los hijos. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es comprarce un carro. En el timpo libre le gusta realizar deporte en especial el futbool.
texts.en:
Luis is 22 years old and is married with two children. He lives with his children and family in the city of Guaranda in the province of Bolívar. He is a member of the Communal Bank "Ally Ñan" which is made up of ten members from the same community, located twenty minutes from the office. 

Luis works in a hardware store and also makes a living planting corn, fava beans and peas and raising chickens. 

He is requesting a loan to buy urea, fertilizer, insecticide and herbicide. With the help of the loan he will be able to buy all that is necessary for his agricultural work. 

He will make his purchases in the city of Guaranda. Supporting his wife with their children is his primary goal. One challenge he faces for the future is to buy a car. In his free time he likes to play sports, especially soccer.

loans.use: to buy urea, fertilizers, insecticides and herbicides.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El Cliente tiene 27 años de edad, es soltero y comerciante, vive con sus padres y elabora antojitos (tostadas de tajaditas de papas, yuca, platanitos) que vende de forma ambulante en las colonias aledañas. Pide financiamiento para la compra de materia prima (fruta fresca, aceite, y combustible) para la elaboracion de estos alimentos
texts.en:
This borrower is 27 years old. He is single and works as a merchant. He lives with his parents and makes traditional dishes (toasts with slices of potato, yucca, plantain). He sells these as a street vendor in nearby neighborhoods. 
He is asking for financing to purchase the raw ingredients (fresh fruit, oil and fuel) to prepare these foods.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients to prepare food

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy beauty products.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta de 21 años de edad soltera vive con su hija en casa de la abuela, su padre le ayuda con remesas que le envia, tiene 4 años de ser comerciante de ropa y solicita el credito para poder surtir con otros productos su mercaderia como son: zapatos, sandalias y de la ropa que actualmente vende ya que con lo que logra vender lleva lo necesario para darle a su familia y su hija una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: This 21 year old borrower is single and lives with her daughter in her grandmother's house. Her father helps by sending her remittances. She has been working selling clothes for 4 years and is requesting the loan to supply her business with other products such as: shoes, sandals, and the clothes that are currently selling because, with what she is able to sell, she can give her family and her daughter a better quality of life.

loans.use: have working capital.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente, de 32 años, se dedica a la actividad de enderezado y pintura de vehiculos, desde hace 10 años. ubica su taller en su propia casa, ya que no cuenta con capital suficiente para rentar un espacio. Solo estudio hasta el nivel de educacion basica, y no ha continuado sus estudios, por lo que realiza esta actividad, que requiere conocimiento empirico y de aprendizaje popular para realizarse. Adicionalmente, realiza otros trabajos de mecanica automotriz, como ajuste o reparacion de motores (que es la actividad que muestra la fotografia), rectifica discos de prensa o clutch, etc. Solicita financiamiento para comprar insumos (masilla, pintura, lija, thiner, etc)
texts.en: The borrower, 32, has been making his living doing up the body work of cars and painting vehicles for 10 years. His workshop is located in his own home as he doesn't have enough capital to rent premises. He only completed primary school and didn't continue his studies which is why he is performing this activity which requires empirical knowledge and general studies to do this work. In addition, Marlon performs other types of vehicle mechanic jobs such as engine repair or adjustments (as can be seen in the photograph), he fixes presses, clutches, etc. He is seeking a loan to buy supplies (filler, paint, sandpaper, thinner and so on).

loans.use: to buy materials to do up the body work and paint vehicles.

loans.name: Raysa Evelis

texts.es:
En la cálida ciudad de Ica, caracterizada por variada agricultura, entre las cuales e destaca el cultivo de algodón, uva, esparrago, entre otros; vive Raiza una joven de 20 años de edad que lucha cada día para poder salir adelante y poder ser el orgullo de sus padres, tal es así que día a día ella trabaja como ayudante en un restaurante de su ciudad, y con el fruto de su humilde trabajo puede solventar con mucho esfuerzo sus estudios de enfermería, es por ello que cada día ella se levanta con mucha alegría y entusiasmo porque ella cree que todo el esfuerzo por salir adelante no es vano y una vez terminada su carrera podrá apoyar a su familia aun más.

Raisa está muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le están brindando, ella podrá comprar materiales para sus estudios como un tensiómetros, jeringas, latillas esterilizadas, entre otros, así como también podrá pagar la mensualidad de su universidad; con ello podrá contar con los materiales necesarios y estar al día en sus pagos universitarios, con lo cual seguirá luchando con mucho entusiasmo para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Terminar su carrera y ser un orgullo para su familia”.
texts.en:
The warm town of Ica is characterised by its varied agriculture, such as cotton, grapes, asparagus etc. There lives Raysa, a 20 year old who fights each day to get ahead and make her parents proud.

Each day she works in a restaurant in her city and with the fruit of this humble work, her hard effort pays for her nursing studies.

For this reason, she gets up joyfully and enthusiastically each morning because she knows that her hard work is not in vain and that once she finishes her degree she will be able to support her family even more. 

Raysa is very thankful to the Kiva loaners as thanks to their help, she will be able to buy the materials for her studies such as a pressure gauge, syringes, surgical pans among others.

It will also mean that she will be able to pay her monthly university fees. She will keep working hard with the assurance that she can buy the necessary tools and pay for her studies. She hopes to achieve her dream of finishing her degree and making her family proud.

loans.use: to pay for her studies

loans.name: Blanca

texts.es:
Blanca, de 31 años de edad, es divorciada y tiene una hija de 08 años de edad.  Vive en compañía de su papá, mamá, su hija y sus 04 hermanos en la casa de sus padres.Blanca se dedica a la venta de ropas y sandalias  de damas y caballeros. También vende cosméticos por catálogos, donde tiene bastantes pedidos de sus amistades y familiares,lleva realizando estos negocios un promedio de 03 años.
Le gusta su negocio pues le genera ingresos económicos para solventar los gastos de su hogar y la educación de su hija.Antes tenia problemas económicos, pues se divorcio  y no recibía pensión para los gastos de su hija. Gracias a su negocio se encuentra mas tranquila y tiene los deseos de ampliar su negocio y hacerlo crecer, abriendo una boutique en la casa de sus padres.Este será el préstamo número 06 con Kiva , por ello cuenta con su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes.
Con el monto solicitado de S/.2000 soles, comprará ropas y sandalias de diversos modelos y de buena calidad .
texts.en:
Thirty-one-year-old Blanca is divorced and has a daughter, who is eight years old.  She lives with her dad, her mom, her daughter, and her four siblings in her parents' home.  Blanca sells men's and women's clothing and sandals for a living.  She also sells cosmetics from catalogs and she has several orders from her friends and family.  She has had these businesses for around three years. 

She likes her business as is generates income to cover her household expenses and her daughter's education.  She used to have financial problems as after her divorce she did not receive child support for her daughter's expenses.  Thanks to her business she is calmer and she wants to expand her business and make it grow, opening a boutique in her parents' home.  This will be her sixth loan with Kiva and she is counting on your support to solidify her plans. 

With the requested 2,000 soles, she will buy different styles of good-quality clothing and sandals.

loans.use: to buy clothing and sandals

loans.name: Las Abejitas Group

texts.es: El banco de emprendimiento LAS ABEJITAS está compuesto por once integrantes, diez mujeres y un varón, la presidenta del banco es la Maria en la foto es la que esta  rodillas en el centro blusa negra la que está con su hijita, ella tiene 23 años tiene una hijita de 3 años,   se dedica a la venta de ropa en las distintas ferias de la ciudad de Santa Cruz, este préstamo es su  primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Maria va a usar este préstamo para la compra de ropa de temporada por mayor para su negocio ella quiere comprar chompas ya que ya está empezando el frio, su razón para solicitar este préstamo es falta de capital, la Sra. Maria enfrenta retos en su negocio que son que tiene que transportarse  mucho con su mercadería para poder vender en las distintas ferias, va a utilizar los beneficios en seguir mejorando su puesto de venta, su deseo para su negocio tener mercadería surtida para ofrecer variedad de productos a su clientes, la Sra. Maria se siente feliz y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado a ella y a todas sus compañeras de grupo ya que son personas que trabajan duro para sacar adelante a sus familias.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank, "Las Abejitas" is made up of eleven member-ten women and one man. The president of the bank is Maria who is shown kneeling in the middle wearing a black top, holding her young daughter. 

She is 23 years old and has a three year old daughter. She makes a living selling clothing in various markets in the city of Santa Cruz. This loan is her first with this institution. Maria will use this loan to buy seasonal clothing at wholesale prices for her business. She wants to buy sweaters as the cold weather begins and is requesting this loan because she does not have enough capital to do so. 

Maria faces challenges within her business, including the fact that she must transport her merchandise in order to sell throughout the various markets. She will use the earnings to continue improving her business. She hopes to have her business better stocked with merchandise in order to offer a variety of products to her customers. Maria is happy and thankful for the institution for the support brought forth to her and to all of her group members. They all work hard in order to help their families get ahead.

loans.use: to buy seasonal clothing.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El Cliente de 34 años, realiza la actividad desde hace 1 año, vive con su esposa y 2 hijos (14 y 10 años), vive en casa de un familiar a quien le cuida la propiedad, y estudio hasta 9o grado. En su vivienda, vende productos de primera necesidad (comestibles, frutas, cereales, consumibles y desechables, pollo, etc). El desea credito para poder comprar mas mercaderia y ofrecer variedad a sus clientes
texts.en:
This borrower is 34 years old and has been in business for one year.  He lives with his wife and two children (ages 14 and 10).  His family lives at a house of a relative, so he takes care of the property.  Alex studied through the ninth grade.  He sells basic necessities (food products, fruit, grains, household and disposable goods, chicken, and other products) out of his home.  

Alex is seeking a loan so that he can buy more merchandise and offer more variety to his customers.

loans.use: to buy various products to sell in his store.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente de 26 años, se dedica desde hace 1 año a la comercializacion de frutas y verduras de forma ambulante en vehiculo, dado que no ha podido emplearse. El estudio hasta 5to grado, y su formacion es agricultor, pero no la realiza, ya que no es propietario de tierra para cultivar. Vive con su compañera de vida y un hijito de 1 año. Pide prestamo para comprar mas frutas y verduras, que obtiene a mas bajo precio con un volumen grande y asi obtiene mayores ganancias, que rondan el 20%, es decir, con la inversion de $400, podra obtener $80 de ganancia, que le permitiran incrementar su capacidad de compra y venta
texts.en:
This borrower is 26 years old.  For the past year, he has been selling fruits and vegetables as a traveling vendor out of his vehicle.  He has no other way of conducting his business.  The borrower studied through the fifth grade.  He started out as a farmer, but he did not pursue this line of work because he does not own land for cultivation.  He lives with his life companion and their one-year-old son.  

He is requesting a loan so that he can buy more fruits and vegetables.  By purchasing a large volume, he will be able to get a lower price and earn more profit (approximately 20%).  In other words, this investment of $400 should yield $80 in earnings.  This will increase his capacity to buy and sell.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables in bulk.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta de 28 años, estudio hasta 3er grado, tiene un hijo, y realiza servicios profesionales para damas y caballeros: corte de pelo, pedicure, manicure, tintes, peinados. Ella solicita el prestamo para comprar materiales para realizar el trabajo que realiza a domicilio, para competir frente a muchos salones de belleza que hay en su lugar de habitacion, que muestra en la fotografia, los mantiene resguardados y solo lleva en su maletin los que utilizara ese dia
texts.en:
This borrower is 28 years old and studied through the third grade.  She has one child.  She offers professional services for women and men such as haircuts, pedicures, manicures, coloring, and hair styling.  

She is requesting a loan so that she can buy supplies for the work she performs out of her home.  She faces competition from several other beauty salons in her town.  As seen in the photograph, She is very guarded with her supplies and only carries in her case what she needs for the day.

loans.use: to buy hair care supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente de 18 años, se dedica a la tienda desde hace 3 años, que ubica en su casa de habitacion. Ahi vende articulos de primera necesidad (comestibles, frutas, verduras, huevos, cereales, etc). El estudio hasta 8o grado y su grado tecnico es mecanico, que realiza de vez en cuando, pero no le da ingresos estables, por lo que prefiere atender la tienda, en la que le genera ingresos porque no hay competencia en la zona que el habita. el desea el apoyo financiero para incrementar los productos que ofrece
texts.en:
This borrower is 18 years old and has managed a store in his home for three years.  There he sells basic necessities such as food, fruit, vegetables, eggs, grain, and other items.  He studied through the eighth grade and received vocational training as a mechanic, which he does occasionally.  However, that type of work does not produce a stable income.  For this reason, he preferred to open a store.  He is able to generate profits because there is no competition in the place where he lives.  

He is seeking financial assistance so that he can increase the inventory of products that he offers.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for his store.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta de 25 años, se dedica a la comercializacion de calzado dentro del mercado local, desde hace un año y medio. Estudio hasta 8o grado, es madre soltera de una niña de 7 años. La mercaderia que ella comercializa son: zapatos de vestir, uniformes, sandalias y chancletas o ginas (como se conoce en el salvador, al calzado para tomar baño o usar en dias de mucho calor). Tal como muestra la fotografia, ella exhibe su mercaderia, para lograr que los transeuntes se interesen en la compra del calzado. Ella solicita prestamo para comprar mas mercaderia y prepararse para la temporada alta de venta de sandalia (epoca de semana santa, se incrementa el calor y se usa mucha sandalia)
texts.en:
This borrower is 25 years old.  She sells shoes at the local market.  She has been in business for 1½ years.  She studied through the eighth grade and is a single mother of a seven-year-old daughter.  

The merchandise that she sells includes dress shoes, uniform shoes, sandals, and flip-flops (or “ginas” as they are called in El Salvador).  As seen in the photograph, she displays her merchandise to passersby who are interested in buying shoes.  She is requesting a loan so that she can buy more merchandise in preparation for the high season of Holy Week when she sells more sandals because of the warmer weather.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente de 27 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de articulos de primera necesidad en su tienda, ubicada en su vivienda, su esposa le ayuda con cubrir los gastos del hogar y los ingresos que el genera ayudan para la manutencion de su hijo de 5 años. Tiene 3 años de poseer la tienda, que recibe muchos visitantes porque se ubica en una zona bastante transitada. El pide $500 para surtir de mercaderia de productos de la canasta basica, que tienen alto costo en volumen (sacos de cereales: frijol, arroz, azucar)
texts.en:
This borrower is 27 years old. He sells basic necessities in his shop, located in his home. His wife helps him cover the household costs and the income that he generates help maintain their five year old son. 

He has had the shop for 3 years and it receives many visitors as it is located in a busy area. 

He is requesting $500 to stock his shop with everyday goods which can be bought in bulk (bags of cereal: beans, rice, sugar)

loans.use: to buy stock for his shop

loans.name: Yeneder Eiver

texts.es: El Sr. Eiver de condición muy humilde desarrolla su  actividad por más de 8 años en la actividad de Cortado, pulido y colocado de Piedra, lo cual acredita la experiencia que este lleva en el rubro, tiene 2 hijos uno de 7 años y otro de 3 años por quienes aspira contar a futuro con una casa propia ya que actualmente vive en condición de alquilado. Es así que hoy requiere del presente crédito para poder compra más materia prima- piedra de la Ciudad de La Paz para poder seguir con las obras que tiene y de esa forma poder seguir percibiendo el ingreso que hoy en día sustenta a su familia. El Sr. Eiver nos comenta que con la ayuda de los recursos que se le otorgue podrá ayudarle a concretar sus sueños y sentirse más satisfecho de poder realizar lo que se propuso, el contar a futuro con una casa propia.
texts.en: Eiver runs his business in a humble way and has done so for more than eight years.  He cuts and polishes stone and has lots of experience in this field.  He has two sons, ages seven and three and he wants to be able to provide them with a home in the future; he currently rents.  He needs this loan so that he can buy supplies in La Paz so that he can continue with his labor and earning the income he needs to support his family.  Eiver says that the resources granted to him will enable him to solidify his dreams and he can feel satisfied to have been able to accomplish what he proposed; providing a future home for his family.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Feliz Asucena

texts.es:
La Señora Feliz vive en Guayaquil (orquídeas), ella tiene 47 años de edad. La clienta ha pasado por muchas dificultades pues el propio papa de sus hijos no le ayuda para nada en los gastos de los hijos cuando ellos eran pequeños, ella tiene que trabajar con la venta de cosméticos para poder subsistir con sus hijos.

Ella trabaja sola en las tardes después del trabajo. A ella le interfieren bastante los ladrones que muchas veces se apoderan de su dinero. Ella no está casada, tiene 3 hijos, de la cuales dos son mayores de edad que le ayudan en el hogar, y el otro tiene 8 años estudia en escuela fiscal. 

Ella usara el préstamo para comprar cosméticos para la venta. Ella desea tener una lavandería de carros para que su hijo trabaje ahí para que arregle su vivienda que está en mal estado.
texts.en:
Sra. Feliz is 47 years old and lives in Guayaquil (Orquídeas). She has had to endure many difficulties since the father of her children has not helped with any of the expenses since they were very little. Feliz must sell cosmetics in order to support her children.

She works alone in the afternoons after she leaves her job. There have been several occasions when she has had to deal with thieves who have gotten hold of her money. Feliz is not married. She has three children, two of whom are grown and help around the house. The other child is eight years old and attends a state school.

Feliz will use this loan to buy cosmetics to sell. She wants to open a car wash so that her son can have a job. She would like to make repairs to her house since it is in bad condition.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more items to sell (goods, snacks and drinks).

loans.name: Himer Yosmany

texts.es:
El Señor Himmer es originario de san Rafael del sur, Nicaragua, viven en una comarca del municipio. Tiene una hija menor de edad,Su actividad comercial tiene una pulpería donde vende todo lo que es granos básicos como el  arroz, frijoles, azúcar, maíz, trigo, productos lacteos el queso, crema, leche entre otros, también vende ropa nueva variada  y chinelas, es una pequeña venta pero surtida de productos básicos para el hogar.

Se le han financiado dos créditos los cuales los ha invertido en su negocio.
Su esposo igual que el atiende el negocio, son dos  jóvenes que han sabido trabaja y luchar por la vida a tener mejores condiciones de vida.

Este cliente inicio su negocio con ahorro y un financiamiento de ceprodel ahora ya su negocio ha crecido y se siente muy contento por el apoyo que se le ha bridado gracias a kiva y ceprodel.
texts.en:
Himmer is originally from San Rafael del sur, Nicaragua. They live in a district of the same municipality. He also has a grown daughter. 

He has a small grocery store where he sells staple goods such as rice, beans, sugar, corn, wheat and dairy products like cheese, cream and milk. He also sells new clothing and flip flops. It's a small store but full of basic products for the home. 

He has had two loans before which he has invested in his business. His partner works in the shop too. They are two young people who have known how to work hard and fight to have a better quality of life. 

This client started his business with his savings and finance from Ceprodel. Now, his business has grown and he is happy with the support that he has been given thanks to Kiva and Ceprodel.

loans.use: to buy trousers, t-shirts, shorts, socks, shoes, flip-flops and basic goods: rice, oil and sugar

loans.name: Fatima Isabel Del Rosario

texts.es:
En la calidad ciudad de Ica caracterizada por sus atractivos turísticos como la Laguna de Huacachina, su agricultura variada y la alegría de sus pobladores, vive Fátima una joven de 18 años de edad, tiene una alegría contagiante y sobre todo muchas ganas de salir adelante, ella vive al lado de sus padres, quienes la apoyan en todo lo que ella emprende a pesar de sus pocos recursos económicos. Fátima es una joven con mucha aspiraciones, es por ello que ella trabaja cada día como empleada en una tienda de venta de productos de construcción y con el fruto de su trabajo puede solventar on mucho esfuerzo los gastos de sus estudios, a pesar de sus pocos ingresos ella esta estudiando con mucha dedicación y se organiza de tal manera que pueda cumplir con ambas responsabilidades.

Fátima está muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar una computadora portátil para poder realizar sus trabajos y poder tener una herramienta muy útil para sus estudios, de esta manera seguir luchando cada día para poder hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:” Terminar su carrera y poder tener su empresa propia”.
texts.en:
In the warm city of Ica, known for its tourist attractions such as the Laguna de Huacachina, varied agriculture and the cheerfulness of its inhabitants, lives Fatima, a young woman of 18.

She has a contagious cheerfulness and above all, a great desire to succeed. She lives with her parents, who support her in everything she undertakes, despite their lack of financial resources.

Fátima is a young woman with many ambitions. That is why she works each day as an employee in a store selling construction products. With what she earns from her work, she is able to cover her school expenses, with a great deal of effort. In spite of her low income, she is studying with much dedication, and organizes her time so that she can fulfill both responsibilities.

Fátima is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, as thanks to the help they have offered her, she will be able to buy a laptop computer so that she can do her work and have a very useful tool for her studies. 

This way she can continue striving each day to make her greatest dream a reality: "To finish my degree and be able to have my own company."

loans.use: To purchase a computer.

loans.name: Luz

texts.es:
Luz, de 66 años de edad, esa casada con Abdias con quien tiene 03 hijos que ya son independientes. Juntos viven cómodamente instalados en su propia casa en compañía de su nieto de 19 años de edad.
El negocio que tiene Luz es la venta de comidas, para eso tienen un pequeño puesto ubicado al frente de una posta de salud, donde vende variados platos de la región y menús a su distinguida clientela, levantándose muy temprano para realizar las compras de los ingredientes que utilizará en la preparación de las comidas.
Ya  lleva 08 años en éste negocio y cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo para atender al público.Le gusta su negocio pues le ha traído muchas satisfacciones personales y económicas, ya que se inicio con la venta de jugos, pasando  a la venta de comidas en una mesa ambulatoria, ahora contando con un local, a sabido ganar buena clientela, viendo esto tiene planes de mantenerse en el negocio por la edad que tiene.Este será el quinto préstamo con Kiva. Por tanto cuenta de un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos.
Con el monto solicitado de S/.500  soles comprará golosinas para mejorar la variedad de sus productos a , así como también los ingredientes para la preparación de sus comidas, buscando precios más cómodos por sus compras al por mayor.
texts.en:
Luz, 60, is married to Abdias, with whom she has three adult children.  They live together comfortably in their own house with their 19-year-old grandson.

Luz's business is selling food in a small stall located across from a health clinic.  She sells a variety of regional dishes and daily menus to her distinguished customers.  She gets up very early to shop for the ingredients she'll use to prepare her dishes.

She has been in this business for eight years already and she has her husband's help in waiting on the public.  She likes her business because it has brought her great personal and financial satisfaction.  She started selling juice, then moved to selling food with a movable table.  Now she has a locale, having learned how to acquire good customers.  In light of this she has plans to support herself with her business because of her age.

This will be her fifth Kiva loan.  She wants a small loan so she can realize her goals.  With the requested amount of 500 soles [PEN] she'll buy candy to improve her product variety as well as the ingredients to make her dishes, looking for better prices with wholesale purchases.

loans.use: to buy candy and cooking ingredients

loans.name: Saturninio

texts.es: Don Saturninio, tiene a su señora quien se encarga del orden del hogar, ahora tienen cuatro hijos que van a la escuela, con sus ingresos como guarda de seguridad ha venido invirtiendo en mejoras del hogar. Ahora solicita nuevamente crédito para enverjar el porche de su casa para brindarle mayor seguridad a la familia, comprara hierro, cemento, arena y verjas ya elaboradas, espera continuar trabajando con Afodenic, ya que está muy agradecido por el apoyo de financiamiento con los cuales ha logrado ir mejorando la infraestructura de su casa, no ha podido culminar del todo porque su salario es muy bajo y su esposa sin empleo, pero esta vez espera avanzar un poco más.
texts.en: Don Saturninio has a wife who keeps their home in order.  He now has four children who go to school.  With his income as a security guard, don Saturninio has been investing in home improvements.  He is requesting another loan to put gates around his house's porch and thereby provide greater security for his family.  He will purchase iron, cement, sand and pre-made wrought-iron gates.  Don Saturninio hopes to keep working with Afodenic, as he is very grateful for the financial help, with which he has been able to keep improving his home's infrastructure.  He hasn't been able to finish everything because his salary is very low and his wife doesn't work.  But he hopes to make a little more progress this time.

loans.use: to purchase iron, cement, sand and pre-made wrought-iron gates.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy buttons and thread to make clothing

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta de 18 años, se dedica a atender una tienda ubicada en su casa de habitacion, que le ayuda a unir ingresos con su compañero de vida y asi sufragar los gastos de su hijo de 1 año. Adicionalmente, elabora pupusas por las tardes desde hace 2 años, que le generan un pequeño ingreso adicional. Como muestra la fotografia, su tienda es de poco tamaño, y requiere insumos para tener variedad de productos. Su vivienda se ubica en una zona de acceso dificil. Pide un credito de $300 que dado su margen de ganancia del 31% podra incrementar poco a poco su inventario y variar los productos que ofrece
texts.en:
This borrower, 18, sells groceries at home. With her and her partner’s income, they support their one-year-old child. She has been also making pupusas [thick corn tortillas] for two years, which gives her an additional income. As the picture shows, her store is small and she needs to buy supplies in order to have a wider variety. She lives in a remote area.

She is requesting a loan of $300, which, considering her 31% profit margin, will help her by increasing her stock levels and improving the variety of the products she sells.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her store.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta de 28 años, es muy conocida en su comunidad, y desde que tomo el curso de cosmetica, se dedica a brindar servicios a damas y caballeros, dando precios especiales a sus clientes leales. Ella vive con su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos (8 y 1 año). Ella solicita financiamiento para la compra de insumos (tintes, shampoo, acondicionador, spray fijador, utensilios para sujetar el cabello, carpetas para resguardar la ropa del cliente cuando aplica tintes, etc). Ella obtiene un margen de ganancia del 75% en la actividad, por lo que la inversion que solicita le permitirìa invertir dicha ganancia en la compra de mas productos
texts.en: This borrower is 28 years old.  She is very well-known in her community and since taking a cosmetics course, she has been providing services to ladies and gentlemen, offering special rates to her loyal customers.  She lives with her life companion and her two children, ages 8 and 1.  She is requesting the funding to purchase supplies (dyes, shampoo, conditioner, hairspray, utensils to hold hair, smocks to protect customers’ clothing when applying dyes, etc.)  She earns a 75% profit margin in her business, so the loan she is requesting will permit her to invest in the purchase of more products.

loans.use: to purchase beauty salon products.

loans.name: Ana Melia

texts.es: Doña Melia de 56 años de edad vive con su esposo en casa de un familiar se dedica a vender tortillas desde hace 12 años y con las ganancias que obtiene ha logardo solventar todos los gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, Doña Melia esta solicitando un credito para poder comprar mas maiz para las tortillas y tambien para comprar una nueva plancha(cocina) para hechar las tortillas ya que con la que cuenta se encuentra deteriorada, puesto que así mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Melia is 56 years old. She lives with her husband in a relative's house. She has sold tortillas for 12 years and with the earnings she makes she has been able to pay for all of her household expenses. Melia is asking for a loan to be able to buy more corn for the tortillas and also to buy a new grill to make the tortillas, since the one she has deteriorated. This will improve and her family's quality of life.

loans.use: To purchase ingredients to make tortillas, such as corn.

loans.name: Kholida

texts.ru: Холида является одним из таких личностей, которая старается улучшить условия жизни и стимулировать экономическое состояние семьи. Она замужем, но не имеет  детей. Ее муж работает в  средней школе учителем  и получает маленькую зарплату. Это зарплата не хватает для обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами. Холида решила помочь мужу для благо получения семьи. С такой целью она обучилась в курсе «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Теперь она вполне может организовать свой бизнес и стать успешной в этой сфере. Она хочет организовать бизнес шитьем и продажи свадебных платьев, так как имеет опыт в шитье свадебных платьев и имеет богатую фантазию и хороший вкус. Так как она живет в сельской местности далеко от центра города, она имеет много клиентов, которые хотят заказать ей свадебные платья. Она будет шить дома свадебные платья, и будет продавать невестам ее села. От полученного дохода она планирует улучшить условия проживания. Она запрашивает займ на сумму  500 сомони для покупки ткани, чтобы организовать новый бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Kholida is trying to improve her living conditions and stimulate the economic status of her family.  She is married, but she doesn't have any children.  Her husband works at a high school as a teacher and he receives a small salary, which is not enough to provide for their family's needs.  Kholida decided to help her husband for the good of her family.  With that goal in mind, she enrolled in the "To Get Ahead" course offered by the Association of Businesswomen and received a certificate.  Now she is fully capable of starting her own business and becoming successful in that sphere.  She wants to start a business sewing and selling wedding dresses, as she has experience sewing wedding dresses and she has a vivid imagination and good taste.  Since she lives in a village far from the city center, she has many clients who want to order her wedding dresses.  Kholida will sew her dresses at home and sell them to the brides in her village.  She plans to use her income to improve her family's living conditions.  She is asking for a loan of 500 somoni to buy fabrics to start her new business.  She is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: To buy fabrics to start a new business

loans.name: Rosa Del Carmen

texts.es: Doña Rosa de 54 años de edad se dedica a la venta de billetes de loteria desde hace varios años,con las ganacias que obtiene ha podido salir adelante y solventar los gastos de su hogar, tiene 24 años de alquilar la casa donde reside con su compañero de vida, ella solicita un credito para poder comprar mas billetes de loteria y asi obtener mejores ingresos para tener una mejor estabilidad economica.
texts.en: Rosa, 54, has been selling lottery tickets for some years. With her earnings she has been able to get ahead and cover the costs of her household. She and her partner have been renting their house for 24 years. She asks for a loan to buy more lottery tickets so that she can get more profits and have more financial stability.

loans.use: to purchase and resell lottery tickets for her business

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en: Ahmad is a married Iraqi youth client who is 28 years old and has one child. Ahmad works hard to provide for his family all by himself. Ahmad owns a carpenter’s shop. He has been practicing carpentry for more than eight years. He specializes in making furniture. Ahmad established his own business in 2011 and has gained good experience in this field. He now has an employee and is well-known in his neighborhood, since he is the only carpenter in the surrounding area. Ahmad is applying for a youth loan of 3,000 USD. He will use this loan to buy a wood-cutting machine. Ahmad is aiming to expand in this field and increase his profits, so he will be able to provide his family with better living standards.

loans.use: to buy a wood-cutting machine for his carpentry shop.

loans.name: Fatmeh

texts.en: Fatmeh is a 62-year-old hard-working woman who applied previously for a loan that was used to enhance her business tools and equipment, to improve the quality of the Arabian bread known as “shrak” that she bakes. By doing so, she was also able to increase her productivity, which helped her to sell more, especially to be eaten with the Jordanian traditional dish, “mansaf.” Fatmeh is applying for another loan to buy more ingredients and increase her productivity.

loans.use: to buy more ingredients for making bread and to increase her productivity.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta, es reconocida por trabajadora y responsable, vive con su compañero de vida y 2 hijos (15 y 10 años), y se dedica a la venta de ropa y perfumeria desde hace 1 1/2 año. la actividad la realiza de forma ambulante en la zona que habita, ya que no posee local. solicita $250 para la adquisicion de 1 fardo de ropa usada para revenderla a personas que por sus bajos ingresos no pueden comprar ropa nueva
texts.en:
This borrower is recognized as being hard-working and responsible.  She lives with her life partner and 2 children (15 and 10 years), and has made her living selling clothes and perfume for 1 1/2 years.  She sells door-to-door in the area where she lives, since she does not have a store.  

She is applying for $250 to buy a bundle of used clothing to resell it to people who, due to their low incomes, cannot buy new clothes.

loans.use: to buy used clothing to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente de 31 años, solo obtuvo la formacion basica por lo que no ha podido emplearse formalmente y decidio hace 6 años montar su pequeño negocio. El ofrece servicios de oficina (copiado, levantamiento de texto, suministro de papeleria, etc) desde el año 2006, en un local ubicado en el centro escolar de su localidad. convive con su esposa y tienen 2 hijos (4 y 2 años), a quienes mantiene del resultado de los ingresos generados por la actividad. el solicita $500 para comprar papeleria y mantener el stock para dar servicio a los estudiantes que le requieren.
texts.en: This borrower, age 31, only obtained a basic education, which is why he hasn't been able to find formal employment.  Six years ago, he decided to start up his small business.  Since 2006, he has offered technological services (copying, transcription, office supplies, etc.) in a small shop located in the local school.  He lives with his wife and they have two children (ages 4 and 2), whom he supports with the income generated by his business.  He is requesting $500 to purchase paper products and maintain his stock in order to provide services to the students who need them.

loans.use: to purchase paper products to resell.

loans.name: Al-Tnwir Group

texts.en: This group is called Al-Tnwir and consists of four ladies who live in Sana`a, Yemen. They applied for a loan of 200,000 YER from AMB to increase their profits. Asia is a 45-year-old married woman who lives with children in Sana`a. She works hard and does her best to provide her family with food and clothing. She is a housewife and dreams of raising her children well. She lives with her family in bad conditions, and she would like to buy furniture to use in her small house, but she suffers from a lack of money. So she is applying for a loan of 50,000 YER. In the future, she hopes to improve her living standards.

loans.use: to buy furniture for her small house, which she has not been able to do because she suffers from lack of money.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more canned goods, snacks and beverages to sell at his sari store (food/retail shop).

loans.name: Raed

texts.en: Raed, who is from Iraq, is 36 years old, married and the father of three children. Raed is the only provider in his family. Raed is a carpenter. He has been in this field for more than 10 years, and he gained his experience by working at several carpentry shops as an employee. Raed specializes in making furniture for bedrooms and living rooms. He established his own business in 2004, and now he has hired an employee. Raed has gained a good reputation in his surrounding area, thanks to his clean work and his affordable prices. Raed is applying for a loan of USD 3,000. He will use this loan to buy an electric saw that is specialized for his work. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide his children with better living standards and good educations.

loans.use: to buy a special electric saw for his work.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es:
Martha, de 36 años de edad, esta casada con Adolfo, quien es electricista y trabaja de forma independiente; y es padre de sus 03 hijos ,juntos residen en su casa propia.La actividad que realiza Martha es la venta de ropas de segunda mano para damas, caballeros y niños de diversos modelos los cuales son adquiridos en la capital en grandes cantidades .Martha vende las prendas entre sus amistades y vecinos, a quines atiende de manera amable, logrando ganarse su preferencia. Lleva más de 04 años dedicándose a éste negocio, y hasta el momento le apoya su pareja en búsqueda de nuevos clientes.Le gusta su negocio pues le genera un ingreso económico y tener una ocupación, además de estar en casa y el tiempo libre lo emplea en el cuidado de sus hijos, y por tanto desea aumentar su stock de mercaderías.
Este será el préstamo número 06 con Kiva  y está muy contenta de  saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su negocio.
Con e l monto solicitado de S/.800 nuevos soles,comprará un mayor numero de ropas de segunda mano, para tener un stock disponible para la venta.
texts.en:
Martha is 36 years old. She is married to Adolfo, who works independently as an electrician and is the father of their three children. They live together in their own home.

Martha sells secondhand clothing of different styles for women, men, and children. She acquires her merchandise in the capital in large quantities. Martha sells these clothes to her friends and neighbors, who she attends to in a friendly manner. In return, they prefer to do business with her. Martha has been in this business for more than four years. Her husband currently helps her by looking for new customers. She enjoys her business because it generates income and provides her with a job. In addition, she can stay at home and look after her children during her free time. Right now, she wants to increase her stock of merchandise.

This will be her sixth loan with Kiva. Martha is pleased to know that she will have financial support. She is confident that she can advance her business. With the loan of 800 PEN that she requested, Martha will buy several pieces of secondhand clothing so that she will have available stock to sell.

loans.use: to buy secondhand clothing.

loans.name: Blanca Celia

texts.es: Doña Blanca de 45 años de edad vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos, ella se dedica a la agricultura su principal siembra es el maiz y el frijol con la cual ha podido solventar todos los gastos que se le presentan en el hogar, su esposo tambien le ayuda en el campo, ella solicita un credito para poder comprar insumos agricolas y asi poder seguir cultivando y poder darle lo mejor a su familia.
texts.en: 45 year old Blanca lives with her husband and 2 children. She works in agriculture and her main crops are corn and beans and with these she has been ale to cover all her household exposes. Her husband also helps her in the fields. She is requesting a loan to buy agricultural supplies and so to be able to keep cultivating and to be able to give the best to her family.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Mutasem

texts.en: Mutasem is a 32-year-old married man with no kids. While his wife is working in a school, he is selling construction materials in his shop. Now Mutasem is applying for a loan to support his business and bring in more materials that are missing in his store.

loans.use: to purchase more construction materials to sell

loans.name: Mary

texts.en: Mary is 52 years old and a widow with one child. She lives in Bonifacio, Misamis Occidental. She owns and operates a retail business to earn a living. She has been in her business for over nine years and earns 15,000 PHP every month. She joined GDMPC in 2010 and now she has requested a loan of 20,000 PHP to purchase additional products to sell such as coffee, sugar, canned goods, noodles and eggs. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell such as coffee, sugar, canned goods, noodles and eggs

loans.name: Edison Herney

texts.es:
Su nombre es Edison Herney tiene 16 años es de un hermoso pueblo de Cundinamarca. Viene de una familia humilde, vive con su mamá la cual le ayuda económicamente con sus estudios en campo alto. Ella es madre cabeza de hogar, lo apoya con sus estudios dándole fuerzas y apoyo para estar en una ciudad solo, así que el debe esforzarse para tener una vida mejor y más placentera, para el porvenir y lo que le espera en la vida, cuida y ofrece un bienestar a su hermano el cual cursa el octavo grado de bachillerato y al cual está seguro de que va a apoyar porque ha sido un gran amigo y apoyo en todas las etapas de su vida y espera que se esmere como lo está haciendo ahora él para ser alguien importante en la sociedad.

Vive en la casa de sus padrinos los cuales le han tendido la mano con la vivienda para poder estudiar ya que de donde viene no se presta el servicio de educación que desea adquirir.

Decidió correr tras un sueño; desempeñarse como cocinero para lo cual está estudiando en CAMPOALTO, lo hace porque le gusta y le nace hacerlo también para que mas adelante con la ayuda de la institución y el apoyo de su familia pueda tener una vida laboral que satisfaga las necesidades económicas que se crucen en el transcurso de su vida y ayudar económicamente a su mamá la cual ha sido una fuente muy grande de apoyo para él.

Acudiendo a campo alto por consejo de una ex alumna de la institución para que entrara a estudiar lo que lo apasionaba, le ha gustado mucho estudiar por que los profesores son muy buenos tienen mucho conocimiento para ofrecer también con las personas que comparte dentro de las instalaciones las cuales ofrecen una buena convivencia.

Uno de sus más grandes sueños es el de desempeñarse como un gran chef nacional e internacional para que su mamá se sienta orgullosa de el porqué su anhelo es que su mama se sienta orgullosa de él y otro de sus sueños es poder ver a su mamá con su casa propia y sin los afanes del dinero porque con lo que el aprenda, el esmero y el esfuerzo con el que estudie pueda salir adelante sabe que económicamente podrá hacerse cargo de ella.
texts.en:
His name is Edison Herney, he is 16 years old and is from a beautiful town in Cundinamarca. He comes from a humble family and lives with his mother, who helps him financially with his studies at CampoAlto. She is the head of the household and supports him with his studies, giving him strength and support being in a city by himself. He therefore must make an effort to have a better and more pleasant life for the future and what he hopes for in life, to care for and offer well being to his brother who is in the eighth grade. He is sure that he will support his brother because his brother has been a great friend and support throughout his entire life. He hopes that he strives as he is doing now to be someone important in society.

He is staying in the house of his godparents, who extended the offer of housing to him so that he would be able to study, as where he is from they don't offer the educational service that he is hoping to obtain. 

He decided to run after a dream; to serve as a cook, for which he is studying at CampoAlto. He does this because he likes it and was also born to do it so that later, with the help of the institution and the support of his family, he may have a professional life that satisfies the financial necessities intersecting in the course of his life and help his mother financially, as she has been a very large source of support for him. 

He went to CampoAlto on the advice of a former student of the institution so that he could study what he is passionate about. He has liked studying a lot because his professors are very good; they have a lot of knowledge to offer. The people he shares the facilities with are also very good company.

One of his greatest dreams is to serve as a great national and international chef so that his mother is proud of him. Another of his dreams is to see his mother with her own house and without cares about money, because with what he learns, the striving and the effort with which he studies to be able to get ahead, he knows that he will be able to take care of her financially.

loans.use: to finish his cooking program at Campoalto

loans.name: Christa

texts.es:
Ella  tiene 20 años.  Es estudiante de enfermería y desde que tiene memoria siempre le ha gustado  todo lo relacionado con la salud, le gusta estar con su familia, asistir a la iglesia, comer saludable, aprender de su mamá siempre, tener buenas amistades y compartir momentos agradables y perdurables, ayudar a la comunidad, ir a la biblioteca, ver documentales científicos, aprender de la salud, leer, y mantenerse fiel a sus principios. 
 Se  ha dedicado a  relacionarse con el Área de la salud  durante y después del colegio para poder saber a qué se enfrenta en la medicina y eso le ha ayudado a  adquirir mayor compromiso de su parte para llegar a ser una excelente  profesional  e influir en la sociedad de manera productiva. Es por ello que ha decidido dar pasos muy seguros y consciente de que tiene que llegar a hacer lo que se proponga en la vida sin importar cuán difícil pueda ser ; gracias a que su familia ha influido de manera importante en ella ha logrado saber que con esfuerzo se logran grandes resultados,  por ello que comenzó  una carrera técnica para lograr adquirir bases que le permitan obtener un saber previo a lo que se enfrentara cuando comience su carrera profesional y también  saber cuál es el compromiso que debe adquirir un profesional de la  salud con su sociedad. 
A medida que avanza se da cuenta de que requiere de mucho esfuerzo lograr sueños que son elevados pero con el trascurrir del tiempo ha podido aprender que si da todo lo mejor de si lograra estar en las posiciones más altas en las que crea que va a estar y gracias a que esta aprendiendo a dar pasos seguros recuerda que cada día debe  aprender a ser mejor de lo que fue ayer y debe ser mejor mañana de lo que es hoy.
texts.en:
Her name is Christa and she’s 20-years-old.  She’s a nursing student.  She’s liked everything to do with health for as long as she can remember.  She enjoys being with her family, attending church, eating healthy, to always learn from her mother, to have good friendships and share pleasant, long-lasting moments, to help the community, go to the library, watch scientific documentaries, to learn about health, to read and to stay true to her principles.

She’s decided to become involved in the health area both while in high school and after to learn what medicine was all about and this has helped her become even more committed to become an excellent professional and have a positive influence on society.  Because of this, she’s decided to take more substantial steps and she’s conscious of the fact that she must attain her life goals regardless of how difficult it may be.  Thanks to the positive influence her family has had on her she’s learned that great results can be obtained through effort and this is why she started a technical career that will provide the basic knowledge she’ll need when she starts her professional career and also to learn the extent of the commitment that will be required by society from a professional in the health field.

As she makes progress, she becomes aware that much effort is needed to attain her lofty dreams but as time has passed she’s been able to learn that if she gives the best of herself she’ll attain the highest positions she can aim for and thanks to the sure steps she’s taking she’s reminded daily that she must learn to be better today than she was yesterday and better tomorrow than she is today.

loans.use: to complete her nursing degree.

loans.name: Cheryl

texts.en:
Cheryl is a diligent mother of three children who is engaged in the livestock business. Cheryl is in her 30s and married. Cheryl's husband works abroad as a planning engineer. Cheryl wants to help her husband in just a simple way. She thought that by doing this, she would simply help her husband provide their needs.

At present, she is taking care of heads of hogs in their village. She doesn’t want to rely only on her husband's remittances, which is why she is asking for a loan of PHP 40,000 to buy feed for her hogs. Cheryl's dream is to have a stall in the market to extend the business and increase her income.

loans.use: to buy feed for her hogs.

loans.name: Julis Milena

texts.es:
Ella es Julis nació en un núcleo familiar conformado por su mama, papa y sus siete hermanitos es la sexta y hoy día tiene veintisiete años.
La niñez por la que  corrió fue normal y muy alegre, disfrutaba de los placeres de los juegos en la calle con balones y tapas sin problemas de inseguridad ni peligros, al contrario se podía decir que ella vivía sin preocupaciones ni complicaciones.
Comenzó a estudiar a los diecisiete años, con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación termino sus estudios, pero no tenia metas planeadas, todo por su condición económica, eso le cortaba las alas a sus sueños. 
A los dieciocho años inicio su vida laboral, ya conoció el termino responsabilidad económica y con esto vinieron muchos planes, entre ellos estudiar, ya conocía los beneficios de tener dinero, pero era momento de saber que quería hacer, por mucho tiempo aplazo sus planes, pero cuando cumplió veinticinco años se dio cuenta que iba a ser mama de una hermosa bebe y ahora su pensamiento incluida a dos personas.
Se dedico a ser feliz y para eso debía esforzarse, inicio su programa académico para desarrollarse profesionalmente y así conseguir mejores oportunidades, tanto laborales como personales.
texts.en:
She was born into a family of ten consisting of her mom, dad and her seven brothers, she is the sixth. She is twenty-seven years old. 

She had a normal and very happy childhood. She enjoyed the pleasures of the games in the street with balls and covers without problems, dangers or insecurity. The opposite could be said that she lived without worries or complications. 

She began to study when she was seventeen years old, and with a lot of effort and dedication she finished her studies. The wings were clips on her dreams because of her economic status, and she did not feel that she could make plans.
 
At the age of eighteen, she started her working life, she now understands the term economic responsibility, and with this came many plans, including study. After working, she learned the benefits of having money. Yet she needed to know, what she wanted to do but for a long time postponed her plans. When she turned twenty-five years old, she realized that he was going to be the mother of a beautiful baby and now her thoughts include two people. 

She spent her time trying to be happy and she needed to make the effort. She began her academic program in CAMPOALTO to develop professionally and thus achieve better opportunities, both professional and personal.

loans.use: to finish her academic program in commerce at Salud

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es:
Un joven al que le ha gustado la música, el deporte, la cocina, que ha puesto empeño desde su bachillerato entre juegos de fútbol, atletismo y taekwondo.
