Al salir del colegio inicio su vida laboral como domiciliario de un restaurante y fue aprendiendo del oficio, así que se decidió y lo ascendieron a mesero, continuamente sus anhelos y deseos de seguir adelante lo impulsaron a iniciar un programa de Administración Hotelera, pero por vueltas de la vida no pudo desarrollarse profesionalmente en esta área, tenía un ahorro en dinero y decidió poner una micro-empresa de recreación en la cual se desarrolla con éxito, después de un tiempo la pasión por lo que le gusta lo llevo a la institución donde se matriculo y cursa primer semestre del programa de cocina, con esto espera retomar su pasión y poder desarrollar una marca en comidas que en un futuro sea reconocida y muy bien remunerada.
texts.en:
The young adult who has liked music, sports, and cooking.  He has put forth efforts since high school in soccer games, athleticism, and tae kwon do.  

After leaving school, he started his work life by making restaurant home deliveries.  He was learning the trade, and that is how they decided to promote him to waiter.  His eagerness and his wish to get ahead continually drove him to start a Hotel Administration program.

However, due to the turns that life takes, he was not able to pursue this area professionally.

He had some savings, and he decided to set up a small recreation business, which he works at successfully.

After a time, the passion for what he likes took him to CampoAlto, where he enrolled and is in his first semester of the cooking program.  With this he hopes to once again take up his passion.  He hopes to be able to develop a brand of food that, in the future, will be well-known and very well rewarded.

loans.use: to complete his studies in the cooking program

loans.name: Kasem

texts.en:
Kasem is an Iraqi client. He is 42 years old, married and the father of four children. Kasem is the sole provider of the family.

Kasem owns a small shop where he sells and changes engine oils and filters. He has been in this field since 2009 and has gained much experience in what he practices. Kasem's business has been growing fast in his neighborhood and he has been gaining an excellent reputation.

Kasem is requesting a loan of 3,000 USD. He will use this loan to renovate his shop by installing ceramic blocks on the shop’s floor and walls. Kasem is aiming to improve his business and increase his profits so he is able to educate his children and take care of his family’s needs.

loans.use: to renovate his shop by installing ceramic blocks on the shop’s floor and walls

loans.name: Batsukh

texts.en: Mr. Batsukh, 39 years old, lives with his family in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. The family resides in their own house on a plot of land. His mother has retired from work and gets a state pension. He has been working as a driver at a private business entity for six consecutive years and accumulated a vast amount of experience. The house the family lives in has deteriorated over the years and needs some serious repair. So he is requesting a loan of 3,000,000 MNT to purchase building materials such as bricks, cement, planks and roofing iron. Using those materials, he can repair and insulate his house and enable his mother to live in comfortable and warm place. The borrower is a very hardworking individual who strives for a better future.

loans.use: to purchase building materials such as bricks, cements, planks and roofing iron

loans.name: Yuly Katherinne

texts.es:
Su nombre es Yuly nació en septiembre y su infancia fue muy dura la cual por problemas de su Mama y su Papa que son separados. La Primaria la realizo en una linda ciudad por motivo laboral de su Mama viajaron a otro pueblo en el 2007 desde ahí empezó a hacer el Bachillerato, Salió del grado once con certificación de Técnico en Salud y Nutrición se enfoco en la salud desde grado décimo siempre le ha gustado todo lo que tiene que ver con masaje, le gusta mucho Fisioterapia y por motivo de presupuesto  pues se inclino por  el lado de Cosmetología y Estética Integral empezó  a buscar por Internet  salieron varios programas y averiguando en la institución  daban una muy buena facilidad de pago y decidió entrar y empezar con su estudio.
Ella vive con la familia de su tía, su deseo es trabajar y estudiar pero por experiencia laboral no ha encontrado un trabajo por medio tiempo pero esta a la espera y esta lista ya que estudia  en la jornada de la noche. 
Sueña con estudiar, trabajar, ser profesional de estética paso a paso y luego colocar un centro de estética y estudiar fisioterapia.
texts.en:
Yuly was born September.  Her childhood was very difficult because her mother and father were separated.  She attended primary school in Duitama while her mother traveled to Garagoa for work.  In 2007, she started high school.  She finished grade 11 with a technical certificate in Health and Nutrition.  Yuly focused on health since grade 10 because she liked everything about the massage therapy field.  Even though she greatly enjoyed physiotherapy, she was also inclined to study Cosmetology and Aesthetics.  Yuly looked at several programs on the Internet and discovered that CampoAlto offered a very good payment option, so she decided to enter its program.  

She lives with her aunt’s family.  Yuly wants to work and study, but due to her work experience she is not able to find a part-time job.  However, she is still waiting and is ready to work during the day while studying at night.  Yuly dreams of studying, working, and becoming a professional in Aesthetics.  Later on, she would like to work at an Aesthetics center and then go on to study Physical Therapy.

loans.use: to finish her program in Cosmetology and Aesthetics with CampoAlto.

loans.name: Eidah

texts.en: Eidah is a 54-year-old illiterate woman. Her husband is a bus driver and they have three sons and a daughter. To help her husband in supporting the family, Eidah sells blankets at home. She is applying for this loan to increase the quantity she has by adding new types of bed cover sets.

loans.use: to purchase new types of bed cover sets to sell

loans.name: Tinatin

texts.en:
Tinatin is 32 years old. She lives in Vani District with husband Gia and two children (10 and 2 years old). Tinatin requested a loan from local financial institutions several times for a family business start-up, but without any success. Her loan request was rejected all the time because of her low income and the family’s poor living conditions.
 
The main source of the income for the family is from agricultural activities. In particular, they have a milk cow and a plot of land where nut trees are grown. Tinatin milks the cow to make cheese. Harvested nuts and the cheese are sold locally at the markets. They are refugees, so their additional income is from government institutions.

Tinatin requested a loan from Credo to start a family business. Her loan request was approved in the frames of the new joint initiative between Kiva and Credo. The start-up loan program envisages provision of business start-up and re-startup credits with soft conditions to country rural poor who do not have access to credit products, being regarded as “high risk borrowers” because of their low income. With the received credit, Tinatin wants to start trading clothes. She will buy at the wholesale price and resell it in Vani district among the villagers with a price markup.  She will be reinvesting the profit to develop the business and earn a good income for her family. The increased income will help her to provide better living conditions for her children.

loans.use: To purchase clothes to sell

loans.name: Alexandra Anabel

texts.es:
La Sra. Alexandra vive en Guayaquil, tiene 27 años de edad. Ella empezó su negocio por la situación económica, comenzo con la venta de ropa y de cosmeticos Yanbal como vendedora. El trabajo lo realiza sola todo el día vendiendo ropa de todo tamaño y de diferentes modas siempre compraba ropa de la temporada.

Está casada, su esposo trabaja en una gasolinera, no tiene hijos por lo tanto lo que gana es para pagar los electrodomésticos del hogar y para seguir construyendo su hogar poco a poco.

Con el préstamo quiere comprar pantalones, camisas, perfumes, cosmeticos. Su sueño es tener su boutique, y ser directora de YANBAL, y así ser una microempresaria y dar trabajo a las demás personas.
texts.en:
Sra. Alexandra is 27 years old and lives in Guayaquil.  She started her business of selling clothes and Yanbal cosmetics because of her financial situation.  Alexandra works alone every day, selling clothes of all sizes and styles.  She always buys her inventory based on what it is in season.  

Alexandra is married and her husband works at a gas station.  They have no children, so whatever she earns goes toward the purchase of household appliances and the cost of ongoing construction of their house.  

With this loan, Alexandra will buy trousers, shirts, perfumes, and cosmetics.  Her dreams include having a boutique and becoming a Yanbal director so that she can consider herself a micro-entrepreneur and provide employment for other people.

loans.use: to buy trousers, shirts, perfumes, and cosmetics.

loans.name: Fanny Angela

texts.es:
La Señora Fanny vive en La Libertad, Ella tiene 38 años de edad. Ella inicio vendiendo ropa ambulante en las casas de sus vecinos e amigos, pero para mejorar sus ingresos logro ponerse un bazar en la parte delantera de su casa. 

Ella atiende en su bazar de lunes a domingo de 8:00 de la mañana hasta las 22:00 de la noche. La única dificultad que se le presenta en su negocio es la falta de dinero para comprar  más mercadería para su negocio.

Ella está casada, y su esposo es albañil, tiene 4 hijos y están en escuelas fiscales. Con el préstamo va a comprar mercadería para su negocio como: cuadernos, lápices, y demás artículos de bazar. 

Ella desea para el futuro incrementar su negocio para darle mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Fanny, age 38, lives in Libertad.  She started selling clothes in an itinerant manner by going to her friends’ and neighbors’ houses.  However, in order to improve her income, she managed to set up a store in the front part of her house.

She works in her store Mondays through Sundays from 8:00 a.m. until 10:00 p.m.  The only difficulty she faces in her business is the lack of money to buy more merchandise for her business.

She is married, and her husband is a bricklayer.  She has four children, and they attend public school.

She will use the loan to buy merchandise like notebooks, pencils, and other items for her business.

In the future she wishes to increase her business and give a better quality of life to her children.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like notebooks, pencils, and other items for her business.

loans.name: Segundo Damian

texts.es:
El Señor Segundo vive en Quevedo (Ecuador), el tiene 45 años de edad. El primero tenía un triciclo, y trabajaba como transportista, pero luego se asocio a una cooperativa y con un préstamo que hizo se compro una moto taxi, y por medio de este pudo trabajar y tener más ingresos para su hogar. 

Su labor empieza desde las 6:00 de la mañana hasta la noche, el es transportista. La dificultad que a él se le presenta en su negocio son las lluvia. El está casado y como él tiene una vulcanizadora la esposa se encarga de atenderla. El tiene 3 hijos y son todos menores de edad. 

El usara el préstamo para comprar materiales para su negocio como: llantas, tubos de llantas, y varias herramientas. El sueño de él para el futuro es seguir arreglando su casa hacerla más grande para arrendar cuartos, y así poder tener más ingresos para el hogar.
texts.en:
Segundo, age 45, lives in Quevedo, Ecuador.  At first he had a tricycle and worked as a carrier.  Then he got together with a cooperative and used a loan to buy a ‘mototaxi’ [three wheeled motorized vehicle].  Through this trade he was able to work and have more income for his household.

His work starts at 6:00 a.m. and he works until the nighttime as a driver.  The difficulty he often faces in his business is the rain.

He is married, and he has a tire repair shop, which he wife tends to.  He has three children; all of them are minors.

He will use the loan to buy materials like tires, inner tubes, and various tools for his business.

His dream for the future is to continue fixing his house and to make it bigger in order to rent rooms.  This way he will be able to have more income for his household.

loans.use: to buy materials like tires, inner tubes, and various tools for his business.

loans.name: Jaime Ramon

texts.es:
El Señor Jaime vive en Orquídeas (Guayaquil), el tiene 57 años de edad. Su historia laboral empezó cuando él se vino de España para tener una mejor calidad de vida y así fue cuando él comenzó a trabajar en su taxi para así poder tener dinero para poder subsistir solo en un nuevo país. 

El trabaja actualmente como taxista y realiza su labor solo, su trabajo  empieza desde las 6:00 de la mañana hasta las 10:00 de la noche. A él se le presento una dificultad en su trabajo le hicieron secuestro exprés. El no está casado, no tiene hijos. 

El usara el préstamo para comprar gasolina, motor, gasolina. El desea para el futuro tener una cooperativa de taxis y así seguir ayudando a su madre en todo lo que ella necesite.
texts.en:
Sr. Jaime is 57 years old and lives in Orquídeas (Guayaquil). He began working when he arrived from Spain so that he could have a better quality of life. When he started working, he drove a taxi so that he could support himself in a new country.

Jaime currently works alone as a taxi driver. He works from 6:00 A.M. to 10:00 P.M. One difficulty he faces in his work is becoming the victim of an “express kidnapping” (being held at gunpoint and forced to withdraw money from an ATM). He is not married and has no children.

Jaime will use the loan to buy gasoline and a motor. In the future, he wants to own a taxi cooperative so that he can help his mother with everything she needs.

loans.use: to buy gasoline and a motor for his taxi.

loans.name: Jose Enrrique

texts.es:
El señor Jose vive en Guayaquil (la libertad), el tiene 41 años de edad. El empezó hace algunos años pescando junto con su cuñado,y les iba muy bien en esta labor que  decidió independizarse para tener más ingresos en su hogar.

 El se va a pescar a las 6:00 de la mañana hasta las 12:00 de la tarde.  El inconveniente más frecuente que se le presenta en su trabajo es el clima. El cliente si está casado, y tiene 5 hijos de 15, 10, 9, 7, 5, y 2 años de edad.

 El cliente usara el préstamo para comprar materiales para la pesca. El desea para el futuro tener una mejor calidad de vida para él y su familia.
texts.en:
Sr. Jose is 41 years old and lives in Guayaquil (La Libertad).  He and his brother-in-law began fishing a few years ago.  They did very well in their work, so he decided to become independent in order to earn more household income.  

He goes fishing from 6:00 A.M. to 12:00 P.M.  The most frequent challenge that he faces in his work is dealing with the weather.  Jose is married and has five children (ages 15, 10, 9, 7, 5, and 2).  

He will use this loan to buy fishing supplies.  In the future, he wants to have a better quality of life for himself and his family.

loans.use: to buy fishing supplies.

loans.name: Helena

texts.pt:
Viúva e mãe de 6 filhos todos maiores, vive na casa própria e sustenta mais 4 netos órfãos.  
É avicultora, vende frangos. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (pintos, ração, vitaminas, e outros), para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria.
No futuro deseja fazer crescer o seu negócio e dar mais educação aos netos, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a dificuldade que tem durante o período de crescimento dos pintos.
texts.en:
Helena is a widow and has six children, all of whom are adults. She lives in a house that she owns and she also supports four orphaned grandchildren.
She's a poultry farmer who sells chickens. With the current loan she intends to purchase supplies (chicks, feed, vitamins, etc.) in order to increase the amount of her merchandise.
Her wish for the future is to make her business grow and provide further education for her grandchildren. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
Her challenge is the hardships she faces during the chicks' growth period.

loans.use: to purchase supplies (chicks, feed, vitamins, etc.) in order to increase the amount of her merchandise.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase loads of clothing in order to stock up with merchandise.

loans.name: Maqboula

texts.en:
Maqboula is a 57-year-old conservative woman who asked her son to appear in the photo instead.

Maqboula is a mother of three and she helps to support them from her tailoring work at home. She is now working on enhancing what she makes to include making curtains in addition to clothing items. For that reason, she applied for a loan to get more fabric and new sewing tools.

loans.use: to buy more fabric and new sewing tools.

loans.name: Germania Medusa

texts.es:
La Señora Germania vive en Guayaquil, tiene ella 65 años de edad. Ella quería seguir construyendo en su casa pero no sabía como hacerlo hasta que decidió ponerse un restaurante, en el cual le fue muy bien. En la actualidad su horario de trabajo es de 9:00 de la mañana hasta las 12:00 de la tarde y trabaja sola. 

El único inconveniente que se le presenta en su negocio es que el lugar es muy pequeño y no entra mucha gente por eso no tiene muchas ganancias. Ella es viuda, no tiene hijos. 

Ella usara el préstamo para comprar víveres: legumbres, pescados, arroz para su negocio. Ella desea más adelante poder tener un restaurante en la principal.
texts.en:
Sra. Germania is 65 years old and lives in Guayaquil. She wanted to continue building on to her house, but she did not know what to do with the extra space, so she decided to open a restaurant. Since then, it has done very well. Germania currently works from 9:00 A.M. to 12:00 P.M. She works alone.

The only challenge she must deal with in her business is that her place is very small. Therefore, not many people can enter. As a result, she is not able to generate a lot of profit. Germania is a widow and has no children.

She will use the loan to buy ingredients for her business such as legumes, fish, and rice. Going forward, Germania would like to have her restaurant in the main part of the house.

loans.use: to buy legumes, fish, and rice.

loans.name: Leonida

texts.en: Leonida is a farmer from the town of Carlos P. Garcia, Bohol. She is a married woman and a mother of four children. Leonida has been in the rice farming business for more than 5 years now. She is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer and pesticides for the farm. With this, she will be able to improve her farm and its harvest.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticides for the farm

loans.name: Lauro

texts.en: Lauro is a 36 year old married man from Ubay, Bohol. He has three children. The oldest is 12 and the youngest is 1. He has been in the motorcycle transportation business for 5 years now. This is the source of his income. He earns 4,000 PHP a month. Lauro is requesting a loan to buy tires, fuel and to renew his license. With the help of this loan, he will be able to keep his motorcycle in good condition. In the future, Lauro hopes to expand his business.

loans.use: to buy tires and fuel, and to renew his license

loans.name: Bonifacia

texts.es:
Bonifacia, de 51 años de edad , está casada y tiene un hijo mayor e independiente. Tiene una casa propia en donde vive a lado de su pareja.El trabajo de Bonifacia consiste en el alquiler de motos para transportar a las distintas personas que solicitan sus servicios. También se dedica a la compra de bebidas gasificadas al por mayor, tiene un espacio acondicionado en  su casa en donde realiza la venta de sus bebidas.Lleva más de  09 años trabajando en éste negocio y lo hace sola ya que su pareja se dedica a otras actividades.Considera rentable su negocio por la demanda que tiene y las buenas ganancias que le deja.
Le gusta su trabajo ya que tiene tiempo para poder hacer las actividades en su hogar, tiene buenos clientes y le va bien ya que gana un buen porcentaje en sus ventas.Este es el préstamo número 07  con Kiva, felizmente le esta yendo muy bien razón por la cual se compromete a pagar todas sus cuotas.
Con el monto solicitado de S/.4000 soles, comprará repuestos para sus motos y  bebidas gasificadas en mayor volumen, entre ellas gaseosas en envase de vidrio y en envases descartables, con esto tendrá mayor cantidad de mercadería en stock y se evitará estar gastando en pasajes a diarios para hacer sus compras.
texts.en:
Bonifacia, 51 years old, is married and has an adult, independent son.  She has her own house where she lives with her husband.  Bonifacia's work consists of renting motorcycles out to a variety of clients for transportation.  She also buys wholesale soft drinks, and has a space in her house where she sells them.  She has worked in this business for more than 9 years and does it alone since her husband is involved in other business.  She considers her business profitable because of the demand she has and the good earnings it leaves her.

She likes her work now that she has time to do household activities, she has good clients and her earnings are good.  This is her 7th loan with Kiva, happy it is going very well because she completes all of her loan payments.  With the amount requested of 4000 soles, she will buy spare parts for her motorcycles and wholesale carbonated drinks, of both glass and disposable containers.  Then she will have a larger quantity of merchandise in stock and will avoid wasting time traveling daily to make her purchases.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for her motorcycles, as well as soft drinks.

loans.name: Eva

texts.es:
La Sra. Eva es soltera, tiene 37 años y se dedica al macate (venta ambulante) de productos que ella misma hace, y que también compra, desde hace varios años. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora y que siempre ha trabajado para poder salir adelante y ayudar a su familia.
Eva hace sus ventas por las ciudades de Villarrica, Coronel Oviedo, pero su punto fuerte se encuentra en Formosa- Argentina en donde tiene muy buena cantidad de clientes.
La Sra. Eva solicita el crédito para compra de sábanas, colchas, cortinas, etc. Con lo que podrá seguir trabajando y cumpliendo con el pedido de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Eva is 37 years old, she is single and she has been working as a “macate” (traveling merchant), selling products that she makes herself and that she buys, for may years. She is a very hardworking woman, and she has always worked in order to get ahead in life and support her family.
Eva sells her products in the streets of Villarica, Coronel Oviedo, even though her best market is Formosa, in Argentina, where she has a good number of customers.
Eva is requesting a loan to buy sheets, bedspreads and curtains, in order to keep on working by satisfying her customers’’ requests.

loans.use: To buy sheets, bedspreads and curtains.

loans.name: Noel Eusebio

texts.es:
El Señor Noel Eusebio posee un pequeño negocio de venta de comida variada  en el departamento de León, siendo este negocio el sustento de su familia.

El Señor Noel Eusebio se presentó a las oficinas de Ceprodel a solicitar un crédito para realizar compras de productos al por mayor el cual ocupa para la elaboración de los distintos tipos de platillos y de esa brindarle a su clientela distintos tipos de comida a su clientela.

Este trabajo lo realiza para aumentar sus ingresos de esa manera ir mejorando la calidad de vida de él como de su familia.
texts.en: Noel Eusebio has a small business selling assorted food in León department. This business is what supports his family. He came to the Ceprodel office to apply for a loan to purchase wholesale goods to make different dishes. This is to offer his customers different kinds of food. He does this work to increase his income and improve his and his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy firewood, oil, rice, chicken, and soft drinks.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
Doña Francisca es una mujer de 44 años de edad, luchadora con un grado de escolaridad de primaria completa Y soltera. Tiene una hija la cual vive con ella y trabaja en una clínica medica como conserje desde hace 7 meses ella es bachiller en ciencias y letras y ayuda a su madre con los quehaceres del hogar y otras actividades.  Ella tiene mucha experiencia en el cultivo de hortaliza (papa) desde hace mas de 25 años y fueron sus padres los que le enseñaron esta actividad desde muy pequeña que ha sido medio de sustento para su familia por muchos años.
Su producto es comercializado a través de intermediarios que llegan a la zona, vecinos y familiares; pero como toda siembra y cultivo no deja de tener riesgo siendo estos las plagas y la variación de precios en el mercado. 

Actualmente doña Francisca solicita ayuda para poder invertir en la siembra de papa comprando fertilizantes, abono, y bombas para fumigación a su producto para que ayude a mantenerlo sano y limpio de plagas.

Su sueño es poder cultivar una variedad de productos para poder ofrecer a sus clientes y demás que ellos tengan mas opciones de compra ya que de esa manera ella podrá generar mas ingresos para su familia y podrá invertir en sus cultivos hasta poder trabajar con capital propio.
texts.en:
Francisca is a 44 year old single woman. She is a fighter and has a complete primary education degree. She has a daughter who lives with her and works at a medical clinic as a custodian. She received her bachelor's degree in arts and sciences 7 months ago and she helps her mother with household chores and other activities. 

Francisca has more than 25 years of experience in growing vegetables (potatoes). From a very young age, her parents taught her the trade which has been the means of support for their family for many years.

She sells her product through middlemen who come to the area, neighbors and family, but like all planting and cultivation, it has risks like pests and fluctuating market prices.

Right now, she is requesting assistance so she can invest in planting potatoes and buy fertilizer, manure, spray pumps to fumigate the product to help keep it healthy and free of pests.

Her dream is to grow a variety of products to offer her clients so that they have more buying options. This way, she can generate more income for her family and invest in her crops until she can have her own capital to work with.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and manure to grow potatoes.

loans.name: Izdihar

texts.en: Izdihar is a 42 year old conservative woman, so her husband appears in the photo instead. They have five sons and one daughter to support. In order to do so, they opened a small business at home selling snacks and candy to the kids in the neighborhood. They want to add more food products to sell, which is why she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to add more food products to her business

loans.name: Abeer

texts.en: Abeer is a 34 year old conservative woman, so her husband appears in the photo instead, as this loan was taken to support him. They have three sons, and to support the family her husband has started his own business using his experience. He is a cooling technician who has his own tools. But now Abeer is applying for a loan to get her husband new tools to enhance his work quality.

loans.use: to get her husband new tools

loans.name: Sandra Daniela

texts.es:
La joven Daniela es originaria de san Rafael del sur, Nicaragua. Trabaja en la educación como maestra de primaria  tiene tres años de laborar, es soltera vive en casa de sus padres.

El financiamiento lo solicito para ayudarle a su mama a realizar mejora en su vivienda, y otra parte la va a invertir en una ventecita de jugos y golosinas en el colegio.

Expreso sentirse muy bien trabajar con ceprodel y kiva ya que ha visto su crecimiento como persona.
texts.en:
Daniela is a young woman from San Rafael del Sur, Nicaragua.  She has been working as a primary school teacher for three years.  She is single, and she lives in her parents’ house.

She requested the loan in order to help her mother make improvements to her house.  She will use the other part to invest in a business selling juices and candy at a school.

She feels very good working with Ceprodel and Kiva because she has seen her growth as a person.

loans.use: to buy construction materials, cement, and sand.

loans.name: Franklin Rodolfo

texts.es: El señor Franklin Habita en el municipio de Ticuantepe en la comunidad llamada Buenos Aires, junto a su familia, el es comerciante de Frutas en los Departamnetos, su mayor sueño es terminar su casa para darle mejores condiciones a su hijos, con este Financiamiento que se le esta otorganto compraralos siguientes Materiales: Arena, Cemento, Perlines, Zinc etc. asi su casa mejorara de aparciencia y tendra mayor seguridad, Agradece el apoyo que Afodenic en conjunto a Fondos Kiva le han  brindado.
texts.en:
Sr. Franklin lives with his family in the community of Buenos Aires in the town of Ticuantepe. He works as a fruit merchant in the various departments. His greatest wish is to finish his house so that he can provide better conditions for his children.

With this loan, Franklin will buy the following materials: sand, cement, crossbeams, zinc, and other items. He will be able to improve the appearance of his house and experience greater security. Franklin is grateful to AFODENIC and Kiva for the support that has been provided.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build an area for painting.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy products (clothing, blankets, lingerie, etc.) to increase the quantity of merchandise she carries.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Greivin

texts.es: Greivin, tiene la edad  de 22 años, está soltero,  vive con su mamá, la cual es su mayor prioridad. El con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de madera y materiales pagar mano de obra en la reparación a la vivienda, y de esta manera eliminar algunas entradas de agua a la vivienda en el periodo de lluvia y así poderle ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida a su madre. Con esta compra pretende hacer una mejora de buena calidad a su casa y que su mamá mejoré su calidad de vida. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Greivin is 22 years old, single and lives with his mother, who is his top priority. With this loan he intends to buy wood and other materials and to pay for the labor to repair his home in order to eliminate leaks that occur during the rainy season. Greivin plans to make a high-quality improvement to his home that will improve his mother’s quality of life.

This is the first loan Greivin has received through FUDECOSUR. He has not had any loans with state banks, but FUDECOSUR has provided him the loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy wood and other materials and to pay for the labor to repair his home.

loans.name: Norma

texts.es: Norma  tiene  57  años de edad, esta casada y vive con el esposo y dos hijos actualmente. Ella con crédito pretende comprar  insumos como abonos, fumigantes, y a su vez ayudarse con la mano de obra. Ella piensa dar mantenimiento a las plantaciones, para que este no sufra ningún daño, y no se pierda la producción, y así con su proyecto cafetalero poder generar más ganancias para contribuir con su familia, ella no cuenta con el capital necesario para dicha compra, ni dichos contratos, ya que es de bajos recursos y no tiene como adquirir el dinero necesario para esto, por lo que el solicito un crédito, y es el primer  préstamo que ha  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja……
texts.en: Norma is 57-years old.  She is married and currently lives with her husband and two children.  With the loan, she plans to purchase supplies, like fertilizers and insecticides, and also to pay for help with the labor.  She plans to maintain her crops and keep them from harm so she won't lose any production. And with her coffee project, Norma will be able to generate more income to contribute to her family.  Norma doesn't have the capital she needs to make the above-mentioned purchases or to contract laborers, as she is low-income.  She doesn't have any way to acquire the money she would need, and that is why she is requesting the loan.  It is the first she has received from FUDECOSUR.  Norma has never before taken out a loan from a state bank, but FUDECOSUR has offered her the loan with much better terms and at a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to purchase supplies.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es: Carlos, un hombre emprendedor , tiene 67 años de edad, es casado y vive con su esposa actualmente, el solicito un préstamo con el anhelo de  comprar insumos como abonos, y fumigantes, el desea dar asistencia a los cultivos de café, con la finalidad de mantenerlas en buenas condiciones durante su desarrollo, para obtener un producto de buena calidad , la única delimitación que este caballero tiene es la falta de dinero  para continuar creciendo, ya que de esta actividad económica dependen para poder salir adelante, por lo que él hace una solicitud  de  crédito , y es el primer  préstamo que ha  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no registra otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja……
texts.en: Carlos, an entrepreneurial man, is 67 years old. He is married and currently lives with his wife. He is asking for a loan because he wants to buy supplies such as fertilizer and fumigants. He wants to help his coffee crops with the goal of keeping them in good condition while they are growing in order to obtain a good-quality product. The only limitation this gentleman has is lack of money to continue growing, since he depends on this work in order to be able to succeed. This is why he is applying for the loan. It is the first loan that he has received from FUDECOSUR. He has no other loans with state banks, but FUDECOSUR has given him the loan more easily and with a much lower interest rate...

loans.use: to purchase farming supplies such as fertilizer and fumigants

loans.name: Manuel

texts.es: Manuel tiene  68  años de edad, esta casado y vive con la esposa y dos hijas actualmente. El con crédito pretende comprar  insumos como abonos, fumigantes, y a su vez ayudarse con la mano de obra. El piensa dar mantenimiento a las plantaciones, para que este no sufra ningún daño, y no se pierda la producción, y así con su proyecto cafetalero poder generar más ganancias para contribuir con su familia, por lo que el solicito un crédito, y es el primer  préstamo que ha  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja……
texts.en:
Manuel is 68 hers old, married, and currently lives with his wife and two daughters. With the credit, Manuel aims to buy supplies like fertilizers, pesticides, and to get help with labor. He thinks of maintaining the plantations, so they will not be damaged, and no production will be lost. In this way, his coffee field project will be able to generate more income to contribute for his family. 

This is why he is asking for credit, and it is the first loan that he has received from FUDECOSUR. Manuel has not had other loans at state banks, but FUDECOSUR he given him the loan with better terms and much lower interest rates.

loans.use: buy supplies.

loans.name: Maria

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 4 filhos dos quais 3 frequentam a escola, vive na casa própria e não sustenta mais ninguém.  
É comerciante, vende capulanas e roupas. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar capulanas, para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria.
No futuro deseja ampliar o seu negócio adquirindo grandes quantidades de fardos de roupa para revender na RSA, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a falta de fundos disponíveis para aplicar no seu negócio.
texts.en: Maria is married and the mother of four children, three of whom attend school. She lives with her family in a home they own and is not financially responsible for anyone else. She has a business selling capulanas (a local sarong-like garment) and other clothing. She will use this loan to buy capulanas to increase the quantity of merchandise she carries. In the future she hopes to continue to expand her business, buying bundles of clothing to sell in South Africa. She is committed to paying off her loan so that she can request further loans from Hluvuku. Her greatest challenge is the lack of working capital available to invest in her business.

loans.use: to buy capulanas to increase the quantity of merchandise she carries.

loans.name: Celeste

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 7 filhos dos quais 5 frequentam a escola, vive na casa própria e não sustenta mais ninguém.  
É comerciante, vende produtos diversos. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (farinha, bolachas, arroz, velas, feijão, e outros), para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria.
No futuro deseja ampliar o seu negócio e adquirir um terreno para construir dependências para aluguer, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a falta de fundos disponíveis para realizar todos seus projectos
texts.en: Celeste is married and the mother of seven children, five of whom are in school. She lives with his family in a home they own and is not financially responsible for anyone else. She has a business selling a variety of products. She will use this loan to buy products (flour, cookies, rice, candles, beans, etc.) to increase the quantity of merchandise she carries. In the future she hopes to expand her business and purchase land to build apartments to rent out. She is committed to paying off this loan so that she can request further loans from Hluvuku. Her greatest challenge is the lack of funds to carry out all his projects.

loans.use: to buy products (flour, cookies, rice, candles, beans, etc.) to increase the quantity of merchandise she carries.

loans.name: G.s Las Pitas#1 Group

texts.es:
El señor Francisco  es una persona  muy  emprendedora vive con  su esposa y sus  hijos en una comunidad al sur de Honduras. Su negocio es venta  granos desde hace más de 15 años. 
Don Francisco el préstamo lo necesita para la compra de  maisillo. Con el crédito  espera  el aumento de sus ventas debido a que contara con más  capital para invertir en su negocio y así tener más mercadería para ofrecer a sus clientes que lo visitan.  
Don Francisco al igual que sus compañeros de grupo  espera poder cubrir un poco sus necesidades, así mismo desea que mejore su situación económica. Y que se vea reflejado con esta inversión. 
Don Francisco en unos años espera con que su negocio siga  creciendo y  este posicionado como la más grande y  reconocido de la zona y poder seguir apoyando a  sus hijos  a que se conviertan en personas de bien  para la sociedad.
Don Alexis su negocio es  compra  y venta de  granos desde hace 3 años. 
Don Sendis su negocio es  compra y venta  de granos  desde hace 3 años.




Choluteca, Honduras – Febrero  del 2013
texts.en:
Francisco is a very enterprising person.  He lives with his wife and children in a community in the south of Honduras.  His business has been selling grains for more than 15 years.

Francisco needs the loan to buy millet.  With the loan he hopes to increase his sales because he'll have more capital to invest in his business and more merchandise for his customers.

Francisco and his fellow group members hope to be able to cover their necessities somewhat.  He also wants to improve his economic situation and see that reflected in this investment.

Francisco hopes that in a few years his business will keep growing and be positioned as the biggest and best known in the area so he can continue helping his children become good people for society.

Alexis has bought and sold grain for three years.  Sendis has bought and sold grain for three years.

Choluteca, Honduras, February 2013

loans.use: para la compra de maisillo para su negocio

loans.name: Juvenil Group

texts.es:
Este grupo llamado Juvenil está integrado por 5 jóvenes que se unieron con el objetivo de poder empezar a trabajar y salir adelante para ayudar a sus familias. Quieren poder ser algún día grandes personas de bien y es por eso que se esfuerzan.
Uno de estos jóvenes es Luciano, quien tiene 19 años, cuenta que está trabajando en la agricultura  ahora está queriendo  empezar con la venta de nafta y así poder tener un ingreso extra para poder ayudar a su familia. El es un joven de muy trabajador, que quiere salir adelante.
Utilizará su crédito en la compra de nafta para la venta y así tener una pequeña ganancia.
En la foto del grupo aparecen los jóvenes con sus padres y ayudantes del grupo.
texts.en:
The communal bank Juvenil (Youthful) comprises five young people who got together to start working and progressing to help their families. They want to be great one day, and they are striving to this end. 

Luciano, 19, is one of the members. He is a farmer, and now he wants to sell gasoline for extra income so that he can help his family. He works hard and wants to succeed. He will use the loan to buy gasoline to sell for a small profit. The young people and their parents and supporters appear in the photo.

loans.use: to buy gasoline to sell.

loans.name: Emiliana

texts.es: La Señora Emiliana tiene 66 años casada con el Sr. Carmelo que tiene 49 años, tienen 1 hijo menor dependiente que estudia en nivel secundaria, ellos viven en la comunidad rural Melga Chimpa Rodeo a 33 km de la ciudad de cbba, toda la familia se dedican a la agricultora producen papa, haba, arveja, en terreno de 2 has herencia de sus padres con rotación de cultivos. Doña Emiliana necesita capital para comprar insumos agrícolas (abono orgánico que en esta época es barato) así para la siguiente campaña agrícola tendrá abono acopiado, una parte necesita para comprar productos agroquímicos para el tratamiento fitosanitario, de esta manera garantizar la seguridad alimentaria y la economía para tener ahorro, nos comenta que ampliara la producción de papa al año, así va tener ingresos suficientes para sacar adelante a su hijo hasta que termine sus estudios superiores.
texts.en:
Señora Emiliana is 66 years old and is married to Sr. Carmelo who is 49 years old.  They have one young dependent son who is studying in secondary school, and they live in the rural community of Melga Chimpa Rodea, which is 33 km from the city of Cochabamba.  The whole family makes a living through agriculture by producing potatoes, broad beans, and peas, with crop rotation on two hectares of land that she inherited from her parents.  

Doña Emiliana needs the capital to buy agricultural supplies (organic fertilizer is cheap this time of year) so that in the following agricultural season she will have fertilizer stored up.  She needs some of it to buy agrochemical products for phytosanitary treatment (which protects against pests and diseases) in order to guarantee food safety.  She also needs the finances to have savings.  She says that it will increase the production of potatoes for a year, thus she will have enough income to support her son until he finishes his higher education.

loans.use: to buy fertlizer and agrochemical supplies.

loans.name: Aida

texts.pt:
Viúva e mãe de 9 filhos dos quais 1 frequenta a escola, vive na casa própria e não sustenta mais ninguém alem do único filho que vive com ela.  
É comerciante, vende produtos alimentares. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (farinha, amendoim, arroz, óleo, feijão, e outros), para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria.
No futuro deseja fazer crescer o seu negócio e melhorar as condições de vida da sua família, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a falta de fundos suficientes para investir nos seus projectos.
texts.en: Aida is a widow and is the mother of nine children, only one of whom goes to school.  She lives in her own home and doesn't support anyone else besides her one son that lives with her.  She sells food products.  She will use this loan to buy products (flour, peanuts, rice, oil, beans, and others) to increase her quantity of merchandise.  In the future, she hopes to grow her business and to improve her family's living conditions.  To do this, she promises to make her payments on time so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.  Her challenge is the lack of sufficient funds to invest in her projects.

loans.use: to buy products (flour, peanuts, rice, oil, beans, and others) to increase her quantity of merchandise.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies

loans.name: Safargul

texts.ru: Сафаргул жительница города Нурек, расположенный в 70 км к юго-востоку от столицы Таджикистана. Ей 54 года. Она вдова с четырьмя детьми. Все ее дети, кроме младшей дочери, уже обзаведены семьей. Сафаргул живет со своей младшей дочерью, которая еще учится в школе. Сафаргул в течение 23 лет работает швеей. Она занимается вышиванием национальных одеял и принимает заказы у себя дома. У нее большой опыт в этой области. Сафаргул запрашивает кредит для закупа ткани и швейной машины с целью расширения деятельности и улучшения процесса своей работы.
texts.en:
Safargul lives in Nurek, which is located 70 kilometers to the south-east of the capital of Tajikistan, Dushanbe. She's a 54-year-old widowed woman who has raised four children. She lives with her youngest daughter who attends school. The rest of her children have families of their own. 

Safargul has 23 years of experience working as a seamstress. She makes national-themed blankets and accepts orders at her home. She's asking for a loan in order to purchase some cloth and a sewing machine so that she can expand and improve her work process.

loans.use: to purchase cloth and a sewing machine.

loans.name: Alena

texts.ru:
Алена  -  фермер. С 2002 года занимается выращиванием помидор, кукурузы, свеклы, яблок, арбузов, картошки и клубники.
Справляться по хозяйству ей помогает муж и 19-ти летняя дочь. 
Развитие деятельности начиналось с выращивания помидор и капусты в открытом грунте.
Алена с мужем решила  приобрести пленку для защиты от холода и ветра помидор и свеклы, и капельную ленту для полива.
В планах на БУДУЩЕЕ:  посадить новые сорта клубники, а также заняться выращиванием винограда.
В личных планах: обеспечить образование дочери.
Нуждается в вашей помощи для финансирования пленки и капельной ленты.
texts.en:
Alena is a farmer.  She has been growing tomatoes, corn, beets, apples, watermelons, potatoes and strawberries since 2002.  Her husband and 19-year-old daughter help her manage the business.  She initially started cultivating tomatoes and cabbage in open ground.  

Alena and her husband have decided to purchase some plastic sheeting to protect their tomatoes and beets from the cold and wind, as well as a drip tape for irrigation.

Alena's plans for the future: to sow new varieties of strawberries, and to start cultivating grapes.

Her personal plans: to provide her daughter with an education.

Alena needs your help to finance the purchase of plastic sheeting and irrigation tape.

loans.use: to purchase farming equipment.

loans.name: Alexey

texts.ru:
Алексей  - фермер. С 2008 года занимается выращиванием  малины, земляники, ячменя, гороха и ежевики.
Справляться по хозяйству ему помогает супруга.
В семье Алексея есть двое маленьких детей 7-ми и 5-ти лет.
Развитие деятельности начиналось с выращивания малины в открытом грунте.
Алексей решил приобрести пленку для защиты малины и земляники от холода и ветра и капельную ленту для полива.
В планах на БУДУЩЕЕ: расширить посадку малины,  приобрести трактор с навесным оборудованием для вспашки и обработки  своего земельного участка.
В личных планах:  Достроить жилой дом.
Нуждается в вашей помощи для финансирования пленки и капельной ленты.
texts.en:
Alexey is a farmer. Since 2008, he's grown raspberries, strawberries, barley, beans and blackberries. His wife helps him run the farm. They have two small children, ages 7 and 5. 

They began to expand their business with growing raspberries on open ground. Now Alexey has decided to purchase some cover fabric to protect his raspberries and strawberries from cold weather. Additionally, he wants to buy a drip tape for irrigation purposes. For these reasons, he's asking for a loan. 
In the future, he plans to expand his raspberry fields and purchase a tractor capable of tilling and ploughing his land.

loans.use: To purchase cover fabric and a drip tape.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es: LA SEÑORITA NANCY, es una persona de 20 años de edad,  de estado civil soltera, actualmente se encuentra cursando una carrera universitaria, vive junto a sus padres y no cuenta con dependientes económicos a cargo. La actividad económica de Nancy es la agricultora, trabaja junto a sus padres y en los terrenos agrícolas de los mismos producen papa, haba, arveja, maíz y cebada en la comunidad de Plano Bajo – Tíraque, que se halla situado a unos 65 Km. desde la ciudad de Cochabamba. Nancy y sus padres manifiestan tener ganas de seguir mejorando su producción agrícola y para tal efecto se ven en la necesidad de solicitar capital de inversión para la compra de abono de gallinaza que les permitirá un mejor rendimiento en su producción agrícola, así mismo realizan la compra de dos ganados bovinos de engorde que a futuro les permitirá obtener ingresos económicos adicionales.
texts.en: Nancy is 20 years old. She is single and doesn't have any dependents. She is currently living with her parents and attending the university. She also works in agriculture with her parents. They grow potatoes, beans, peas, corn and barley in the community of Plano Bajo-Tíraque which is located about 65 km from the city of Cochabamba.  Nancy and her parents would really like to increase their agricultural production so they are requesting a loan to buy poultry manure to help them achieve a higher yield. They will also buy two cows to fatten, providing them with additional income.

loans.use: purchase poultry manure and two cows.

loans.name: Patma

texts.ru:
Патма молодая, трудолюбивая  женщина и любящая мать.  Она  замужем, имеет пятерых детей. Ее муж находится в Российской федерации на заработках.  Сама Патма  занимается откормом и разведением скота.  У нее большая семья и ей очень трудно одной воспитывать детей но она не подает духом и старается делать все чтобы ее дети не нуждались не в чем.  Дети Патмы тоже ей помогают.  Она доит корову а дети продают молоко своим соседям. От этого получают не большой доход.  
 Патма сама занимается куплей продажей скота. Каждые два месяца она выводит скот на рынок продает и сразу же покупает молодых телят. Этот бизнес у нее единственный и она старается развивать этот вид деятельности. 
На полученный кредит Патма планирует купить еще несколько голов скота и увеличить свое стадо.  Она заранее благодарит организацию Арванд за помощь и поддержку.
texts.en:
Patma is a young hardworking woman and also a loving mother.  She is married and has five children.  Her husband is currently working in the Russian federation while she raises and fattens livestock.  She has a large family, and she finds it very difficult to raise her children by herself, but she is not giving up and she does everything to ensure that her children are not lacking anything.  Her children also help her.  For example, she milks her cow and the children sell the milk to their neighbors.  They make a small income doing this.

Patma buys and sells livestock by herself.  Every two months, she takes some livestock to the market, sells it, and then buys other young calves right away.  This is her only business, and she is trying to expand her activity.

Patma plans to use her loan to buy a few more head of cattle to increase her herd.  She thanks the microfinance institution Arvand in advance for its help and support.

loans.use: to buy some cattle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy milk, cheese, soda, and other basic staples

loans.name: Tania Judith

texts.es: Tania es soltera tiene 20 años de edad  no tiene hijos es estudiante universitario de textileria y comercio. Actualmente trabaja como costurera  en el taller de confección de sus padres. El préstamo que se le hizo lo usara para pagar las mensualidades de la universidad. Su mayor deseo es seguir estudiando la carrera de diseño de modas y darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Tania agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el préstamo brindado.
texts.en:
Tania is 20 years old, single, and has no children.  She is a university student who is studying textiles and business.  Tania currently works as a seamstress at her parents’ sewing workshop.  

This loan will be used to pay for her monthly university fees.  Her greatest wish is to continue studying for a degree in fashion design so that she can provide a better quality of life for her family.  Tania is grateful to the Kiva lenders for the loan that has been provided.

loans.use: to pay for her monthly university fees.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy clothing for girls

loans.name: Sandra Teofila

texts.es: La señora Sandra Teófila tiene 32 años, es una persona joven y trabajadora, que por muy mala fortuna quedo huérfana desde muy pequeña quedando al cuidado de sus abuelos de muy bajos recursos económicos, los cuales se vieron obligados a dejarla al cuidado de su madrina quien era comerciante de comida, la misma le enseño a cocinar. Tiene dos hijos los cuales no conocen a su padre debido a que este los abandono cuando aún eran pequeños. Para poder mantener a sus hijos tuvo que trabajar en diferentes áreas, hasta que al final su madrina le cedió el puesto de venta desde hace dos años atrás, es desde ahí que Sandra Teófila se dedica a la venta de comida poco a poco está equipando su cocina, el motivo del presente crédito es para que Sandra pueda renovar su vajilla ya que la anterior ya presente deterioro y así seguir poder dándole a sus hijos una vida digna.
texts.en: Sandra Teófila is 32 years old, young and hard working.  Because of unfortunate events, she has been an orphan since she was very young.  She remained in the care of her grandparents, but because they had very few financial resources, they left her in the care of her godmother.  Sandra’s godmother sold food for a living and she taught Sandra how to cook. Sandra also has two children who don’t know their father because he abandoned them when they were still young. In order to provide for her children, she had to work in different areas until her godmother eventually gave up her sales stand two years ago. Now Sandra Teófila sells food from the stand and, little by little, she is equipping her kitchen. Sandra will use the current loan to buy new dishes since her present ones aren't in very good condition. This will help her to continue giving her children a decent life.

loans.use: purchase new dishes.

loans.name: Madres Unidas Group

texts.es: El grupo “MADRES UNIDAS” grupo conformado por personas emprendedoras. Margarita tiene 64 años es madre de 9 hijos ya mayores de edad. Margarita se dedica a la venta de medias, ropas interiores, paraguas, actividad que realiza desde hace muchos años. El préstamo que le dió KIVA lo utilizó en la compra de más mercadería para su negocio. Su mayor deseo es tener un stand propio y ayudar a sus nietas en su educación. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA. Margarita es la primera del lado izquierdo viste con blusa negra.
texts.en:
This is the Madres Unidas group, made up of entrepreneurial people.  Margarita, 64, is the mother of nine grown children.  Margarita makes a living selling stockings, underwear, and umbrellas, a job she has done for many years.

She used her Kiva loan to buy more merchandise for her business.  Her greatest desire is to have her own stand and to help her grandchildren with their education.

The group is grateful to the Kiva lenders.

Margarita is the first one on the left; she's wearing a black blouse.

loans.use: to buy stockings, underwear, and umbrellas

loans.name: Mujeres Triunfadoras Group

texts.es: El grupo “MUJERES TRIUNFADORAS” grupo conformado por 9 socios dedicados a diversas actividades del comercio. Leocadia es una de las integrantes tiene 51 es casada. Se dedica a la venta de golosinas hace 27 años. Lo viene realizando ambulatoriamente en un kiosco trabajas de lunes a domingos. El préstamo que se le dio lo utilizo para compara mas mas golosinas y arreglar su kiosco. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el préstamo. Leocadia es la primera del lado derecho viste con polo amarillo y falda celeste.
texts.en:
The “Mujeres Triunfadoras” [Triumphant Women] group, composed of nine members, all of them with different lines of work. Leocadia, 51, is married and is one of the members. She has been selling candies for twenty-seven years as a street vendor, Monday to Sunday. She used the loan to buy more candies and fix her portable stall. The group wants to thank Kiva lenders for the loan.

Leocadia is first from the right, wearing a yellow t-shirt and a blue skirt.

loans.use: to buy candies and fix her stall.

loans.name: Bruno Martin Lizardo

texts.es: Bruno de 22 años de edad,  soltero y sin hijos, es una agradable estudiante de la facultad diseño gráfico que estudia mucho para alcanzar sus metas en la vida. Bruno  tiene la meta de culminar sus estudios con éxitos y poder ser un buen diseñador gráfico. El préstamo otorgado lo invertirá  para el pago de sus pensiones universitarias  y  realizar la compra  de útiles de estudio que necesita. Bruno se encuentra muy agradecido  por la ayuda brindada y se despide con muchos deseos de culminar sus metas propuestas agradece a Edaprospo y kiva.
texts.en:
Bruno, 22, is single and has no children. He is a nice student from the Graphic Design faculty, who studies hard in order to reach his goals in life. Bruno’s goal is to receive a degree and become a good graphic designer.

Bruno will use the loan to pay for the tuition fee and buy some supplies he needs to study. Bruno feels grateful for the help he has received and sends his regards. He is eager to reach the goals he has set for himself and wants to thank EDAPROSPO and Kiva.

loans.use: to pay the tuition fee and buy some school supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to reinstall the wiring in his home

loans.name: Amanda

texts.es:
Amanda, tiene 43 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 6 hijos y vive con tres de ellos en Cofradia, Cortes.
Doña Amanda, hace 10 años inicio su negocio un taller de costura, donde confecciona ropa como uniformes, vestido camisas, faldas etc. El taller lo tiene ubicado en su casa. Ella se propuso inicair este negocio con la necesidad de mantener a sus hijos y poder superarse. Cuenta con su propia clientela y le motiva mas para seguir haciendo las prendas de vestir de buena calidad para que sus clientes queden satisfechos.Ha solicitado con Odef un prestamo de 6000 lempiras para comprar material como , hilo y telas para seguir elaborando la ropa. Su meta es crecer en el negocio, obteniendo clientes nuevos y mejorar las condiciones de vida para sus hijos.
texts.en:
Amanda, 43, is a single mother.  She has six children and lives with three of them in Cofradía, Cortes.

Ten years ago Amanda started her sewing workshop, where she makes clothing such as uniforms, dresses, shirts, skirts, etc.  The shop is located in her house.  She made the decision to start this business because she needed to support her children and be able to improve herself.  She has her own customers, which motivates her to continue making good-quality garments so her customers are satisfied.

She has requested a loan for 6000 lempiras [HNL] to buy materials such as thread and fabric to continue making clothing.

Her goal is to grow in the business, acquire new customers, and improve her children's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy thread and fabric to make clothing

loans.name: Arnulfo

texts.es: El señor Arnulfo tiene 42 años de edad, vive en la Comunidad Indígena Nueva Galilea de la provincia Carrasco, del Municipio de Chimore, Arnulfo vivía en el departamento de Santa Cruz hace como 15 años atrás,  se vino a Chimore dejándolo toda sus pertenencias y se conoció con la señora Ines con la cual se encuentra concuvinado y tiene cinco hijos,  Arnulfo trabaja como Agricultor y su segunda actividad es el Rallado de Madera en la comunidad Nueva Galilea. Esa son las dos maneras de la que obtiene sus ingresos económicos.  El préstamo que solicita Arnulfo es para la Ampliación de su producción de Plátano y  de esa manera podrá tener ingresos suficientes  y poder ayudar a sus hijos a terminar el colegio. Arnulfo sueña con un futuro mejor para sus hijos ya que el no pudo terminar el colegio ni hacer una carrera, pero él quiere que su hijos si puedan realizar una carrera y poder ayudar a las personas de la zona.
texts.en: Arnulfo is 42 years old, and he lives in the Nueva Galilea Indigenous Community in the province of Carrasco, in the municipality of Chimore. Arnulfo lived in the district of Santa Cruz 15 years ago, but he came to Chimore when he left behind all of his belongings and met Ines, with whom he married and had five children. Arnulfo works in agriculture and his secondary business is milling lumber for the Nueva Galilea Community. These are the two ways in which he earns money. The loan that Arnulfo is requesting will be invested in expanding his banana production. This will allow him to bring in enough money to help his children finish high school. Arnulfo dreams of a better future for his children, as he himself was not able to finish school nor start a career. He wants his children to be able to start a career and be able to help the people of their community.

loans.use: tend his banana plantation.

loans.name: Paola Yolanda

texts.es: Paola es una señorita muy trabajadora con muchos deseos de superación y con ganas de salir adelante.  Paola  de 22 años de edad,  soltera y sin hijos, es un agradable estudiante de la facultad de secretariado administrativo  estudia mucho para alcanzar sus metas en la vida. Paola  tiene la meta de culminar sus estudios y así ser exitosa en la vida. Paola  ha solicitado un nuevo préstamo para pagar matrícula y pensión, Paola  cumplirá sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo agradece por la ayuda brindada a Edaprospo Y Kiva y  se despide con la seguridad   de culminar sus metas propuestas.
texts.en:
Paola is a very hard-working young woman with a great desire to get ahead. Paola, 22, single and childless, is a friendly student of the Department of Administration and Office Communication. She studies a lot to achieve her goals in life. 

Paola has the goal of completing her studies and by doing that, to become successful in life. Paola is requesting a new loan in order to pay for tuition and room and board. Paola will achieve her goals with a lot of work and effort. She is thankful for the help offered by Edaprospo and Kiva, and she says goodbye with the assurance that she will achieve the goals she mentioned.

loans.use: to pay her school fees

loans.name: Zamira

texts.ru:
Замира добрая, ответственная и порядочная женщина.  Она мать двоих детей.  Замира по профессии швея, более десяти лет она преподает уроки кройки и шитья. У неё много учеников, которые хотят научится у неё этому делу. В основном Замира шьёт женские национальные платья. Также она преподает в техникуме в сельском районе для молодых девушек.
Замира не давно получила водительские права и теперь планирует купить автомобиль.  Так как этот район далеко от ее дома, ей очень трудно туда добираться ,поэтому она решила приобрести автомашину. На данный момент у нее есть денежные средства но на машину не хватает. На полученный кредит Замира добавив свои накопленные средства надеется купить авто и осуществить свои планы.
texts.en:
Замира добрая, ответственная и порядочная женщина.  Она мать двоих детей.  Замира по профессии швея, более десяти лет она преподает уроки кройки и шитья. У неё много учеников, которые хотят научится у неё этому делу. В основном Замира шьёт женские национальные платья. Также она преподает в техникуме в сельском районе для молодых девушек.
Замира не давно получила водительские права и теперь планирует купить автомобиль.  Так как этот район далеко от ее дома, ей очень трудно туда добираться ,поэтому она решила приобрести автомашину. На данный момент у нее есть денежные средства но на машину не хватает. На полученный кредит Замира добавив свои накопленные средства надеется купить авто и осуществить свои планы.

loans.use: Zamira is a kind, responsible and trustworthy woman. She has two children. She is a seamstress by trade; for over 10 years, she has been teaching dressmaking. She has many students wishing to learn this trade. Zamira mainly sews traditional women’s outfits. She also teaches at a rural technical college for young women. Recently, Zamira obtained a driver’s license, and now she plans to buy a car. Since that rural area is far from her home, commuting is very hard for her, which is why she decided to buy a car. At present she has some funds, but insufficient for a car. By combining the loan with her savings, Zamira hopes to realize her plans to buy a car.

loans.name: Sulaymon

texts.ru:
Сулаймон честный и трудолюбивый мужчина.  Он женат и имеет детей. Сулаймон занимается откормом скота и дополнительно по сезонно занимается выращиванием абрикосов. Летом он собирает абрикос,сушит и зимой продает.Но основной доход у него от откорма скота. Многие его знакомые уехали в РТ и звали его с собой но Сулаймон не хочет оставлять свою семью одних и старается как то прожить на своей родине. 
Сулаймон  каждый месяц выводит скотов на рынок и продает и на полученную прибыль сразу же покупает молодых скотов.  Этот бизнес дает ему очень хорошую прибыль, поэтому он старается развивать этот бизнес.  Сулаймон давно хочет купить собственное авто чтобы легче было развозить скотов на рынок. Но пока у него не достаточно средств, поэтому он на данный момент планирует увеличить свое стадо.
На полученный кредит Сулаймон хочет приобрести скот и расширить свой бизнес, и тем самым копить на авто.
texts.en:
Sulaymon is an honest and hard-working man. He is married and has children. Sulaymon raises cattle and, in addition, grows apricots in season. In the summer he harvests apricots, dries them, and sells in winter. But his main source of income is from raising cattle. Many of his friends have left for [the Russian Federation] and encouraged him to go along with them, but Sulaymon does not want to leave his family behind and attempts to make a living in his  native country as best he can.

Every month Sulaymon brings cattle to the market for sale, and immediately uses his revenue to buy young cattle. This business brings in a very good income, so Sulaymon tries to keep developing it. For a long time, he has wanted to buy his own [truck] in order to bring cattle to the market more easily. But for now he lacks the means, so at present he plans to increase his headcount. Sulaymon wants to use his loan to buy cattle and expand his business, which will help him continue saving for a truck.

loans.use: to buy  cattle.

loans.name: Linda

texts.en: Linda, who goes by “Lindy Lou,” was a welder in San Francisco before a vacation in Austin convinced her to migrate to a more economical place to live. But she couldn’t stand welding in the paralyzing Texas heat and was soon looking for a new line of work. Then, one night in 2003, she stepped out in a pair of Souvenir shoes which got her a lot of attention – and got her to thinking about parlaying the shoes into a new career. The Souvenir is a wooden wedge peep-toe shoe with a carved heel often with brightly painted designs. It was wildly popular during World War II when U.S. soldiers gifted them to their wives or girlfriends back home; hence, the name. Linda thought of getting them reproduced, found descendants of the family who originally hand-carved them in the Philippines, and convinced them to carve for her. She soon hit stores and trade shows worldwide with her new business, Lucky Lou, selling an average of 300 pairs per show. Linda’s “overnight” entrepreneurial success story came to a sudden halt in 2009 when she says her manufacturer began cutting corners and producing bad quality shoes, which resulted in a large number of returns and refunds. After deciding to end her business relationship with the manufacturer, Linda was shocked to find him taking everything she had, including copyrighted designs and pictures from advertising photo shoots, and selling her designs for a lot less. He effectively put her out of business. “I begged and pleaded for everyone to help me,” she recalls. Linda went to multiple organizations for a loan and was turned down each time until she found ACCION Texas Inc. – thanks to a referral from BIG Austin. “They were very supportive. That launch from ACCION enabled me to purchase 600 shoes, then those sales helped me to purchase 1,000,” she says. Linda found a new manufacturer in September and is now contracting with other designers such as Betty Page Clothing. Linda has also been in contact with tattoo artist Kat Von D and pop singer Katy Perry’s managers to design something Linda will manufacture. She says, since she can place any design on the shoe, “There’s no reason I can’t appeal to the entire market of women.” She says, without the loan, “I wouldn’t be in business; there’s no way.” Because of ACCION, “I just sold the first batch and made $22,000 in two days. I’m doing another show this week. It was really good timing for once in my life.” Stores in Italy, Spain and other European countries now sell her product. And, with the initial funds from ACCION, she was able to hire a graphic designer and a photographer. Though they aren’t full-time employees, she plans to put them and her assistant on her payroll soon and hire someone to take over her social media pages. When she gets an office, she plans to hire someone to work there full-time. Linda says her best-selling design is the Rockin’ Tiki. View more styles on her website: www.luckyloushoes.com, Twitter: https://twitter.com/luckyloushoes, and Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Lucky-Lou-Shoes/116127981747588.

loans.use: To hire four employees and purchase inventory

loans.name: Khurmo

texts.ru: Хурмо 22 года. Она умная и трудолюбивая женщина. Она замужем, но не имеет детей. Ее муж Комрон является мастером по переработки древесина. Хурмо является студентокой 4 курса Педагогического Университета Таджикистана. Она учится в факультете Иностранных языков. Она хорошо владеет английским языком. Хурмо участвовала в нескольких соревнованиях и занимала первое и второе место. Она дополнительно занимается изготовлением кондитерских изделий. Она имеет своих клиентов, которые покупают ее кондитерские изделия. Она должна оплатить за учебный договор в университете, но не имеет денег. Она запрашивает займ для оплаты учебного договора. Она ждет вашу доброту и мечтает стать успешной учительницей.
texts.en:
Khurmo is 22 years old.  She is a smart and hardworking woman.  She is married but does not have any children.  Her husband, Komron, is a master wooodworker.  

Khurmo is a fourth-year student at the Tajik State Pedagogical University.  She studies at the Faculty of Modern Languages and speaks very good English.  She has taken part in several competitions and won first and second place.

Khurmo is aso involved in the preparation of confectionery products.  She sells her goods to her own customers.

Khurmo must pay her tuition fees, but she doesn't have the money to do so.  This is why she is requesting a loan.  She is awaiting your kindness and dreams about becoming a successful teacher.

loans.use: to pay for her tuition.

loans.name: Sarwar

texts.en:
Sarwar is a 50-year-old man. He lives in Lahore, Pakistan with his family. His family consists of 8 children and a wife. Sarwar has excellent embroidery skills. He provides embroidery services in his community and all of his clients appreciate his work. 

Presently he is in need of purchasing clothing, needles, lace, a variety of Stones and threads for his business. For that he has requested a loan amount of 100,000 PKR from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan. 

He is currently living in a rented house so he wishes to purchase his own house in the future. He is hopeful that the loan will be a progressive one for his family.

loans.use: to purchase clothing, needles, lace, a variety of stones and threads for his business

loans.name: Gerelmaa

texts.en:
Gerelmaa, 34 years old, lives with her family in Ulaanbaatar, capital city of Mongolia. The family is now residing in a Mongolian traditional ger (portable felt dwelling) temporarily on a fenced in land. She has been running a clothing sales business since 1999 and accumulated a vast amount of experience. In 2007, she and her husband went to Korea on an employment contract, but returned to Mongolia to give birth to their second child. During the summer time when most construction work takes place, her husband works at a construction site.

In January, 2013, the house they used to live in burned down due to an accident and they were forced to stay in a Mongolian traditional ger in harsh winter time weather. Now the price of building materials is reaching its lowest level and buying them will benefit the family greatly. So she is requesting a loan of 6,800,000 MNT to purchase building materials such as bricks, cement, planks, iron and plates. Compared to the Mongolian traditional ger, a house enables the family to burn less coal, emit less smoke and it contributes to the efforts against air pollution. The borrower is very hardworking individual who strives for a better life.

loans.use: to purchase building materials such as bricks, cement and planks

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more flour, sugar, margarine, spices to prepare pastries and sell to her customers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more items to sell (Ready to wear clothing and cosmetics)

loans.name: Matluba

texts.ru: Матлюба женщина, которая всегда в движении, то есть она всегда старается усовершенствовать свои идеи. Она разведена и не имеет детей. После развода она вернулась в родительский дом и до сих пор живет вместе с родителями. Ей 34 года. Она очень добрая женщина. Более 4 года она начала свой бизнес купле продажей мороженного. Ее родители имеют маленький доход, и поэтому ей было необходимо расширить свой бизнес. С целью расширения бизнеса она 1 год назад начала свой бизнес купле продажей дисков.  Она арендует помещение в центре города и имеет своих клиентов. Благодаря хорошему сервису и ее этики речи, ее клиенты довольны ею. Матлюба планирует улучшить свое благосостояние. Она мечтает купить машину и ездить на нем каждый день. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 2000 сомони для покупки дисков для расширения оборотного капитала. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Matluba is a very active woman who always tries to perfect her ideas.  She is divorced and has no children.  After her divorce, she moved back to her parents' home and still lives with them. She is 34 years old and a very kind woman.  

Over four years ago, she started her own business, buying and selling ice-cream.  Her parents have a small income, which forced her to expand her business.  To do so, she started buying and selling compact discs one year ago.  She is renting an outlet in the center of town and has her own clients.  Thanks to the quality of the service she provides and to her work ethic, her customers are very satisfied.

Matluba wants to improve her financial situation.  She dreams about buying a car and driving it every day.  She is requesting a loan of 2,000 somoni to buy compact discs to increase her working capital.  She is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: to buy compact discs and increase her working capital.

loans.name: Linver

texts.es: El señor Linver  tiene 29 años, es soltero,  tiene un hijo al cual mantiene. Hace pocos meses atrás se separó de su conviviente, vive en la zona del Abra de la ciudad de Cochabamba, en la casa de su madre. El señor Linver ha logrado estudiar una carrera universitaria pero por el gran desempleo que existe en Bolivia no ejerce su profesión, por lo que tuvo que dedicarse al servicio de taxi, gracias a sus ahorros ha logrado comprarse un automóvil con el cual trabaja. El destino del crédito es para realizar la chapería de su taxi, ya que con el transcurso de los años la pintura se deterioro y necesita tener presentable su taxi para seguir trabajando y de esa manera mantener a su pequeño hijo. Entre sus sueños y metas esta poder ejercer algún día su profesión  para empezar nuevamente sus estudios  y tener un mejor nivel de vida.
texts.en:
Linver is 29 years old. He is single and has one child whom he supports. A few months ago, he separated from his partner. He lives in his mother’s home in the Abra region of the city of Cochabamba. 

Linver has succeeded in getting a college degree, but due to the high unemployment that exists in Bolivia, he cannot find work in this profession. Therefore, he has to work in the taxi service. Thanks to his savings, he has been able to buy a vehicle, which he works with.

The purpose of the loan is to do some bodywork on his taxi, since the paint deteriorated with the passing of the years, and he needs to keep his taxi presentable in order to continue working, and in this way, support his small child.

Among his dreams and goals are to be able to someday work in his career in order to start his studies again, and to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to pay for taxi bodywork.

loans.name: Ramaz

texts.en:
Ramaz is 34-years-old. He lives in Dagva village, Kobuleti District with his retired parents. Ramaz requested a loan from local financial institutions several times for a family business start-up, without any success. His loan request was rejected each time, because of low income and the family’s poor living conditions. 

Ramaz is an artisan. He works at the local furniture workshop on a small monthly salary. His father is an artisan too, who works on construction for private orders. The family's additional income is from Ramaz’s parent’s monthly pensions.
 
Ramaz requested a loan from Credo to start-up a family business. His loan request was approved in the frames of the new joint initiative of Kiva and Credo. The Start-up loan program envisages provision of business start-up and re-startup credits with soft conditions to country rural poor, which do not have access to credit products, being regarded as “high risk borrowers” because of low income. With the received credit Ramaz will purchase all the needed materials to open his own furniture workshop.
